direction.raw_text: : On the blackness of SPACE, beautiful and mysterious, strewn with a billion stars. Atop a building, a wrought-iron sign -- a HAMMER-WIELDING BLACKSMITH -- spins listlessly in the wind as a swirling breeze kicks up. A hint of what's to come.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . PUENTE ANTIGUO, NEW MEXICO - NIGHT 1 A main street extends before us in this one-horse town, set amid endless flat, arid scrubland. A large SUV slowly moves down the street and heads out of town.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . SUV - NIGHT 2 The SUV sits parked in the desert. Suddenly, the roof panels of the SUV FOLD OPEN. The underside of the panels house a variety of hand-built ASTRONOMICAL DEVICES, which now point at the sky.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (late 20's) pops her head through the roof. She positions a MAGNETOMETER, so its monitor calibrates with the constellations above. It appears to be cobbled together from spare parts of other devices.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hurry! We hear a loud BANG followed by muffled CURSING from below. Jane offers a hand down to ERIK SELVIG (60) who emerges as well, rubbing his head.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh-- watch your head.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Thanks. So what's this "anomaly" of yours supposed to look like?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's a little different each time. Once it looked like, I don't know, melted stars, pooling in a corner of the sky. But last week it was a rolling rainbow ribbon--
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: "Racing " round Orion?" I've always said you should have been a poet. Jane reigns in her excitement. She tries for dignity. 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 1A.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hey, Darcy. Pass up the bubbly and my gloves, will you? Intern DARCY LEWIS (20) hands Jane a bottle of Champagne and a pair of gloves through the window. Jane passes it to Selvig to hold while she pulls on the old gloves -- too large and masculine for her small hands. He starts to unwrap the foil, and she stops his hand with an excited grin.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Not until you see it!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (re: the gloves) I recognize those. Think how proud he'd be to see you now. Jane's grin fades to a sad smile.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Thank you.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: For what?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The benefit of the doubt. The two stare out at the sky expectantly. A long beat while they scan the skies. Nothing. Jane's worried. 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 2.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's never taken this long before. Darcy calls up from the front seat.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (O.S.) Can I turn on the radio?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (an edge to her voice) Sure, if you like rocking out to
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: "All agriculture, all the time." Worried, Jane heads back down into the vehicle.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . SUV - NIGHT 3 The SUV is bathed in the glow of high-tech monitoring equipment and laptops, some looking like they're held together with duct tape. Jane opens a well-worn NOTEBOOK of handwritten notes and calculations. Selvig watches the frustrated Jane with sympathy.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The anomalies are always precipitated by geomagnetic storms. She shows him a complicated CHART she's drawn in the book, tracking occurrences and patterns.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The last seventeen occurrences have been predictable to the minute... I just don't understand. Something catches Darcy's eye out the driver's side mirror. She adjusts it. In the distance, ODD GLOWING CLOUDS form in the skies over the Northeastern end of the desert.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Jane? Jane SHUSHES her, leafs through her notes. The bottle of champagne begins to vibrate.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: There's got to be some new variable... Or an equipment malfunction... The lights and equipment in the SUV begin to FLICKER around them. The computer monitors SQUELCH with static. 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 2A.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I don't think there's anything wrong with your equipment... The champagne bottle starts to RATTLE noisily now as it shakes more violently. Jane and Selvig notice. 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 3. They watch it curiously, pressure building up inside it, when the cork EXPLODES out of it. Champagne goes spewing everywhere -- over equipment, over Jane.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Jane?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What?!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I think you want to see this. Darcy points out the window. Jane and Selvig look out. Over the desert -- MASSIVE CLOUDS OF RAINBOW LIGHT Churn in the sky. The three stare, dumbfounded.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Holy. Shatner.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That's your "subtle" aurora?!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No-- yes! Let's go!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . DESERT - MOMENTS LATER 4 The roof panels still open, the SUV races towards the strange event, Jane, amazed by the sight, stands with half her body out the roof, taking video of the light storm before them. The SUV hits a bump. Jane nearly flies out. Selvig grabs her, yanks her back in.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . SUV 5 Jane grins, thrilled, pumped with adrenaline.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Isn't this great?! A thought strikes her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You're seeing it too, right? I'm not crazy?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That's debateable. Put your seat belt on! 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 3A. The SUV lurches.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . DESERT 6 Winds HOWL around the SUV now. Up ahead, spiraling down from out of the clouds comes -- AN ENORMOUS TORNADO Suffuse with the strange rainbow light, ROARING like a thousand freight trains as it touches down. 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 4.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . SUV 7 Selvig looks up through the still-open sunroof at the enormous glowing funnel cloud with wonder. Jane clambers into the front seat, beside Darcy. She leans way out the window, TAPING the storm.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You've gotta get us closer so I can take a magnetic reading. Darcy laughs.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah, right! Good one! (then, realizing) Oh God, you're serious...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You want those college credits or not?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . SUV 8 The SUV tears across a field towards the tornado, Jane leaning out the window, taping the event. The SUV disturbs two RAVENS perched on a cactus as they race past. The birds take flight, when -- KRAKABOOM! A huge BOLT OF LIGHTNING strikes down through the center of the funnel cloud before them with a terrifying intensity.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . SUV 9 The SUV rocks from the blast. Darcy's had enough. She turns the wheel, starts to head away.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Keep the credits. I'll intern at Burger King.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What are you doing?!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Saving our lives! Jane grabs the wheel, jerks it hard the other way. They struggle for control, when the headlights fall on -- A MAN 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 5. Directly in their path, stumbling through the winds. Darcy slams on the brakes, Jane turns the wheel hard to avoid him. The SUV swerves -- but too late.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . BIFROST LANDING SITE (EARTH) 10 The side of the SUV slams into the man with a THUD, sending him flying. The car SKIDS to a stop.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . SUV 11 Jane, Darcy, and Selvig trade shocked looks, breathing hard. They peer through the dust clouds, unable to see through. A paralyzed moment, then they all leap out of the car.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . BIFROST LANDING SITE (EARTH) 12 The three race from the SUV with flashlights. Jane spots the man lying on the ground. He's dressed in tattered clothing, charred and blackened.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I think that was legally your fault.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Get the first aid kit. Darcy heads back inside the SUV as Jane, concerned, kneels next to the man. Selvig hovers, protectively. She gently turns his head to the light, and we see him clearly for the first time. He is magnificently handsome, long blonde hair flowing around his classically sculpted features. She cups her hands around his face, as if willing the life back into him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Come on, big guy. Do me a favor and don't be dead, okay? Open your eyes and look at me. Suddenly, he GROANS, and she's startled, then relieved, as his eyes flutter open. She looks deep into his confused, azure eyes, which at last focus on her own. Locking onto them. For a moment, they each forget to breathe. The connection is broken as Darcy returns with the kit. She freezes when she sees how gorgeous the man is. 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 5A.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Wow. Does he need CPR? Because I know CPR. A flustered Jane smooths her hair and sits back on her heels. She looks up at Selvig. Back to being a scientist.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: --are beautiful.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: --are dilating. That's a good sign.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We still have to get him to a hospital.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: After we get a reading on the storm?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Immediately, Jane. Jane sighs and nods, regretfully watching the storm EVAPORATE above their heads. A thought strikes her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Where did he come from? They exchange puzzled looks, as we move up through the last glowing remnants of the storm, and into:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . SPACE 13 EARTH spins slowly before us as we hear a voice, deep and resonant -- the voice of HEIMDALL, Gatekeeper of Asgard.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (V.O.) Questions, they've always asked questions -- this race called man, on this planet they call earth. Passionately longing to know how they are connected to the heavens. 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 6. We pull away from the planet, widening, past other worlds, cosmic debris -- leaving first our solar system, then our galaxy.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (V.O.) (CONT'D) In ages past, they looked to us as gods, for indeed so many times we saved them from calamity. We tried to show them how their world was but one of the Nine Realms of the Cosmos, linked to all others by the branches of Yggdrasil... We pull back until we see it -- YGGDRASIL. Immense, sprawling, like a quasar or a nebula twisted into the vague shape of a TREE, its branches of glowing energy stretching out into the black void of space.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (V.O.) (CONT'D) ...the Worlds Tree. Nine Realms in a universe of wonder, beauty, and terror that they barely comprehended. We move in through Yggdrasil, until we reach what looks like a galaxy, slowly spinning before us.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (V.O.) (CONT'D) But for all their thirst for knowledge, they let our lessons fall into myth and dreams. Where did he come from? He came from us, the proudest race of warriors the Worlds have ever seen. He came from this -- the greatest Realm the universe has ever known. We move through the galaxy's mists and astral matter, then over and up, through a band of prismatic color to reveal what's on the other side:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (V.O.) (CONT'D) He came... from Asgard!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . ASGARD - DAY 14 Beautiful beyond imagination. We fly over the magnificent landscape of the Realm, through the gleaming capital city, modern yet timeless. 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 6A.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . ODIN'S PALACE - DAY 15 The palace rises countless stories tall, gleaming with an other-worldly majesty, towering high above the Realm sprawled out before it. We move towards a large window of the palace, where a FIGURE STANDS -- 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 7.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Stares out at his kingdom. The ravens fly up to the balcony, land at his side.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . ODIN'S CHAMBERS - DAY 16 Odin turns away from the window. His wife FRIGGA sits at a vanity and tries different earrings before the mirror.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Do you think he's ready?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He thinks he is. He has his father's confidence.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He'll need his father's wisdom.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And his humility? Odin reacts.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Thor won't be alone. Loki will be at his side to give him counsel. Have faith in your sons.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes, but Thor's still a boy. He could be a great King... Odin stops, notices HIS HAND SHAKING. It seems to be out of synch temporally with the rest of the world, leaving a trail as it moves. He stares at it determinedly, concentrating, trying to stop the strange event through the force of his sheer will. 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 8. Finally, the occurrence subsides, his hand normal once more. A worried Frigga covers his hand with her own.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (QUIETLY) ...if we only had more time.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: For once, our son needs something we cannot provide.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I can fight it a little longer...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No. You've put it off too long! I worry for you. He touches her cheek.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I've destroyed demons and monsters, devastated whole worlds, laid waste to mighty kingdoms, and still you worry for me?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Always.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Not today. Now come kiss your king... while I'm still king. He pulls her close, and they kiss.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . PALACE ANTEROOM - DAY 17 Directly under the throne room, a gloomily lit hall. Banners hang on either side to form a corridor down the middle of the fire lit room. Giant doors open at one end. A huge figure silhouetted against the bright light beyond walks forward. In slo-mo, we recognize the unmistakable shape of the God of Thunder. Hammer in hand, he reaches the end of a raised platform. An ATTENDANT hands the figure a goblet of wine. He downs it quickly, hurls it towards the fire directly below.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Another! 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 8A. The cup smashes, the alcohol causes the fire to glow intensely -- and, for a moment, brightly lit, and seen full length, like a King to be, is THE MIGHTY THOR. He proceeds down stops, past camera, and down the center of the Hall. We follow from behind and see at the other end, massively shadowed on one of the great banners, the shape of two great horns. As Thor approaches, the horn shapes move, and then, from the shadows at the side, emerges LOKI, wearing his horned headpiece. Like Thor, he is dressed for a great ceremony. They stand by a brazier at the foot of steps that lead up to the crowded throne room.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Nervous, brother? 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 9.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Have you ever known me to be nervous?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: There was the time in Nornheim...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That wasn't nerves, brother. It was the rage of battle. How else could I have fought my way through a hundred warriors and pulled us out alive? The Attendant approaches with another goblet of wine for Thor.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: As I recall, I was the one who veiled us in smoke to ease our escape.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Some do battle, others just do tricks. The Attendant stifles a laugh. Loki notices, doesn't like it. He gestures towards the goblet in the Attendant's hand.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: pour over the sides of the goblet, slithering out and across the terrified Attendant's hand. He SCREAMS, hurls the goblet to the ground. Loki chuckles.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Loki... Loki gestures to the writhing eels on the ground. They turn back to spilled wine, the illusion shattered.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Now that was just a waste of good wine.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Just a bit of fun. (to the Attendant) Right, my friend? The Attendant isn't so sure. Thor dons his EAGLE-WINGED HELMET.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (re: Thor's helmet) Nice feathers. 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 9A.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You don't really want to start this again, do you, Cow?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I was being sincere!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You're incapable of sincerity.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Am I? He looks his brother in the eye, all pretense lost.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I've looked forward to this day as long as you have. You're my brother and my friend. Sometimes I'm envious, but never doubt that I love you. 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 10. Thor searches his brother's face, sees no trace of irony. He's either speaking from his heart or he's a very, very good liar. Maybe both. Thor puts an appreciative hand on his brother's shoulder.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Thank you. The two brothers take in the moment a beat, then:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Give us a kiss.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Stop. Thor makes the final adjustments to his ceremonial wear.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: How do I look?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Like a king. They hear the blast of a CEREMONIAL HORN.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's time.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You go ahead. Loki casts him a wary look.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'll be along. Go on. Loki heads inside the palace without his brother.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . ANTECHAMBER - NIGHT 17A VOLSTAGG combs his great beard in preparation for the big event. As he does, he's surprised to find a stray GRAPE stuck in the beard. He pulls it out, looks around, then eagerly pops it into his mouth and gobbles it down.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: checks his reflection in a mirror, smooths out his moustache, gives himself a dashing smile. A PRETTY MAIDEN holds the mirror before him, as other MAIDENS look on dreamily.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Thank you, love. (to the Maidens) (MORE) 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 10A.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Now who'd like to polish my sword for me? The giddy Maidens eagerly raise their hands.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: stands staring ahead grimly, his hands folded in front of him, amidst the hustle and bustle of the ATTENDANTS and the ceremony preparations going on around him. A HELPFUL ATTENDANT approaches him and starts to polish his armor. Hogun turns his head, gives him a look. Intimidated, the Attendant quickly backs away. From behind, we see a WOMAN IN CEREMONIAL ARMOR take off her
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: and set it on a table, then her SHIELD, then several
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: and small, yet intimidating WEAPONS. We reveal that it's SIF, looking radiant. She eyes the weapons on the table.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (to the weapons) I'll miss you.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . THRONE ROOM - DAY 18 Colorful CEREMONIAL BANNERS of the Nine Realms adorn the room, crowded with AESIR and REPRESENTATIVES from across Yggdrasil, all BUZZING with excitement. Thor's COMRADES enter and stride to their place of honor at the front of the hall. They are:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: has the girth and strength of a Sumo wrestler, with oversized passions to match. FANDRAL, the consummate swashbuckler, is agile, charismatic, and nattily dressed.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: dark, sullen, brooding -- a large MACE slung at his side. With them walks the warrior maiden SIF. She's clad in armor, a shield and sword at her side -- a beauty not to be trifled with. 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 11.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I hope this goes quickly. I'm famished.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Noooo!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Are you attached to that pretty face of yours? Because one more word, and you won't be.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (to the others) My, we are hungry, aren't we? The others laugh, save Hogun. Fandral turns to him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Go on, Hogun. Smile. You can do it. Even you, Hogun the Grim. Just one smile. Hogun stares at him grimly.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: All right, half a smile. Look, forget the smile, just show some teeth.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Fandral, is it true the famous Warriors Three are ready to meet any challenge?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Name it, Lady Sif.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Keep your mouth shut. 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 12.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . VAULT - DAY 19 Imposing EINHERJAR GUARDS clad in armor, swords at the ready, stand watch inside the massive underground structure beneath the palace. A cold BREEZE blows past them.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . PALACE ANTEROOM - DAY 19A Thor stands, his fingers nervously drumming the handle of his hammer. Frigga approaches behind him, sees his anxiety.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's all right to be nervous.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Why does everyone keep saying that? I'm not nervous!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You may be able to fool the rest of
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...but never you. I know.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Thor, just remember that you have something even the great Allfather never had.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And what is that?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Me for a mother. She smiles.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Now don't keep your father waiting. Frigga leaves.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . THRONE ROOM - DAY 20 Sif and the Warriors Three still wait before the crowd. Loki and Frigga enter. Loki takes his place at the front of the hall alongside the others. With another blast of the horn, the crowd goes silent as the EINHERJAR HONOR GUARD moves into formation. They part to reveal -- ODIN 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 12A. Sitting atop his throne, clad in full ceremonial armor. He holds his spear GUNGNIR before him. Any trace of weakness in him is gone now. He exudes all the power and majesty of a Ruler of Asgard. Frigga joins him at his side. He looks around the hall, casts a glance over to the Warriors. Thor is nowhere to be seen. Odin looks to Loki. Loki shrugs. Odin isn't pleased. A murmur spreads through the crowd.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (sotto, to Loki) Where is he?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He said he'd be along. Sif realizes the truth, shakes her head in disapproval.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He wants to make an entrance.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well, if he doesn't show up soon, he shouldn't bother. Odin looks like he's ready to feed him to his ravens.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I wouldn't worry. Father will forgive him. He always does. 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 13. Just then, at the back of the hall, up the steps from the lower level -- MJOLNIR Roars up into the hall, Thor strides cockily into the hall behind it, catching it behind his back. The CROWD erupts in
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . Thor spins his hammer with a flourish, holds it up before the crowd, basking in the moment, relishing the adoration, whipping his audience up into a frenzy.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, please. Odin watches from the front, not liking this showy display.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . VAULT - DAY 21 As the sound of the cheers echo from above, the odd, cold breeze picks up in the Vault. The Guards rub their limbs to warm themselves. They grow increasingly uneasy, sensing something's not right. They exchange a look, then walk the length of the Vault's hallway to its end, where a CASKET sits undisturbed upon a pedestal.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: suddenly loom over them. They look up and
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: in terror as they raise their weapons.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . THRONE ROOM - DAY 22 Thor finishes stirring up the crowd, then reaches the front of the room, kneels on one knee before his mother and father. Frigga casts him an admonishing glance. Thor winks up at her. She can't help but smile. Odin strikes Gungnir upon the ground with a deafening BOOM. The crowd falls silent. Odin speaks with quiet, effortless authority. He raises Gungnir before him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Gungnir. Its aim is true, its power strong. With it I have defended Asgard and the lives of the innocent across the Nine Realms since the time of the Great Beginning. And though the day has come for a new King to wield his own weapon -- that duty remains the same. Thor Odinson, my heir, my first-born. (MORE) 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 13A.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: So long entrusted with this mighty hammer, Mjolnir. Forged in the heart of a dying star, from the sacred metal of Uru. Only one may lift it. Only one is worthy. Who wields this hammer commands the lightning and the storm. Its power has no equal -- as a weapon, to destroy, or as a tool, to build. It is a fit companion for a King. 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 14.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . VAULT - DAY 23 The bodies of the Guards are flung to the Vault's floor, now strewn with ice. We don't see their attackers clearly, just catch glimpses of them in the shadows -- but they are large and BLUE-SKINNED. One of the creatures lifts the Casket off its stand and turns to go. But, as they do, the intricate latticework behind the Casket starts to separate and retract, revealing something standing in the shadows behind it. As the creatures walk away, a fiery glow rises behind them. They turn back around. Now it's their turn to SCREAM.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . THRONE ROOM - DAY 24 The Ceremony continues.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Today I entrust you with the greatest honor in all the Nine Realms. The sacred throne of Asgard. I have sacrificed much to achieve peace. So, too, must a new generation sacrifice to maintain that peace. Responsibility, duty, honor. These are not merely virtues to which we must aspire. They are essential to every soldier and to every King. The Crowd and the Warriors Three start to shiver and rub their limbs for warmth in the increasingly cold air of the hall. Thor turns back to face his father. Odin looks upon his son with pride. 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 15.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Thor Odinson, do you swear to guard the Nine Realms?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I swear.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Do you swear to preserve the peace?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I swear.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Do you swear to cast aside all selfish ambition and pledge yourself only to the good of all the Realms? Beat.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I swear.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Then on this day, I, Odin Allfather, proclaim you-- Odin hesitates, noticing a strange sight before him. ICE creeps across the surface of the large banners around the hall, making an eerie CRACKING sound. Thor, his comrades, and the crowd see it too.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (REALIZING) Frost giants... The far-off sounds of a BATTLE echo in the depths of the palace below. Sif and the Warriors Three reach for their weapons, as Thor races from the hall.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 16.
direction.name: direction

result.heading: 24A OMITTED SCENE MOVED BELOW 24A 25 OMITTED SCENE COMBINED WITH SCENE 25B BELOW 25 25A OMITTED 25A

direction.raw_text: . VAULT - DAY 25B Thor enters, then stares shocked at the sight before him. Sif, the Warriors Three, and Loki hurry in behind Thor and stop short. Shattered and melting ICE is strewn about the floor. We don't see the blue-skinned bodies of the Frost Giants clearly, just catch glimpses of their twisted and smoldering remains on the floor. They've just lost a savage battle. Badly. Amidst them, shrouded in shadow, stands the black metal creature, a fiery glow coming from within it. It is THE DESTROYER. It holds the Casket in its hands.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The Destroyer.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I thought it was but a legend. Odin steps in behind the Asgardians, as the Destroyer sets the Casket back on its pedestal. It moves back to its post, the faint, FIERY GLOW extinguishes within it. Fandral looks around the Vault, ill at ease.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I've never been inside the Vault before. It's said the Tesseract was once held here.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The Tesseract? I thought that was but a legend too!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Shush! Odin surveys the destruction.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The Jotuns must pay for what they've done! 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 16A.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They have paid with their lives. The Destroyer did its job, and the Casket is safe. All is well.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: "All is well?!" They broke into the Weapons Vault! If the Frost Giants had stolen even one of these
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: But they didn't.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I want to know why they--
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The Casket of Ancient Winters belonged to the Jotuns. They believe it's their birthright.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And if you hadn't taken it from them they would have laid waste to all the Nine Realms!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I have a truce with Laufey, the Jotun King.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He just broke your truce! We must act! Odin turns to Sif and the Warriors Three.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Leave us. Thor's comrades exit. Odin eyes Thor, as Loki watches.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And what action would you take?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: March into Jotunheim as you once did, teach them a lesson, break their spirits so they'll never dare try to cross our borders again!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You're thinking only as a warrior! 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 16B.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This was an act of war!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It was the act of but a few, doomed to fail.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They got this far!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We will find the breach in our defenses. It will be found, and it will be sealed. 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 17.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: As King of Asgard, I would--
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You are not King. Not yet. Thor sees in his father's face that he's pushed this as far as he can. He backs away, then leaves, pushing through the doors so hard that they SLAM backwards behind him. Odin watches him go.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . BANQUET HALL - DAY 26 Thor stands in the empty hall, bearing the signs of the festivities cancelled due to the events of the day. Anger and frustration rising within him, Thor upends one of the massive tables. From across the room, Loki watches him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sif, Fandral, and Hogun follow Volstagg as he enters in search of his dinner.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Redecorating, are we? Volstagg surveys the overturned tables and food, aghast.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What's this -- ?!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I told you they'd cancel it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We thought that was just you being your normal cheery self. Volstagg looks about the floor, despairing.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: All this food -- so innocent, cast to the ground. It breaks the heart! Thor strides away from them to the far end of the hall. Loki calmly moves towards him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's unwise to be in my company right now, brother. 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 18.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Who said I was wise?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (re: the empty hall) This was to be my day of triumph.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It will come. In time. (ADMITS) If it's any consolation, I think you're right. About the Frost Giants, about Laufey, everything. If a few of them could penetrate the defenses of Asgard once, who's to say they won't try again. Next time with an army?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes, exactly!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: But there's nothing we can do without defying Father. Thor considers this, looks at his hammer, a gleam in his eye. Loki can guess what he's thinking, grows concerned.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No... stop there! I know that look!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's the only way to ensure the safety of our borders.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's madness!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Madness? What sort of madness?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Nothing! Thor was making a jest!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The safety of our Realm is no jest. We're going to Jotunheim. 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 19.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What?!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Thor, of all the laws of Asgard, this is one you must not break. Loki looks on, intrigued by the proceedings.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This isn't like a journey to Earth, where you summon a little lightning and thunder and the mortals worship you as a god. This is Jotunheim.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And if the Frost Giants don't kill you, your Father will!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: My father fought his way into Jotunheim, defeated their armies, and took their Casket! We'd just be looking for answers.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It is forbidden! Thor sizes up his friends, smiles. He proceeds to make his case with enthusiasm and charismatic conviction.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: My friends, have you forgotten all that we've done together? He turns to Fandral.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Who brought you into the sweet embrace of the most exotic maidens in all of Yggdrasil?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You did.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Who led you into the most glorious of battles... (TO VOLSTAGG) ...and to delicacies so succulent, you thought you'd died and gone to Valhalla? 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 19A.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You did. / You did. He turns to Sif.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And who proved wrong all who scoffed at the idea that a young maiden could be one of the fiercest warriors this Realm has ever known?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I did.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: True. But I supported you... (then, to the others) My friends, trust me now. We must do this. The others exchange concerned looks, realize there's no convincing him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Come on. You're not going to let my brother and me take all the glory, are you? Loki looks startled.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You are coming with me...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes, of course! I won't let my brother march into Jotunheim alone. I will be at his side.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And I.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And I. 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 20.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And I. The Warriors Three fight together.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I fear we'll live to regret this.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: If we're lucky.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . ODIN'S PALACE - DAY 27 Thor, Sif, Loki, and the Warriors Three walk from the Palace, across the grounds. They reach a group of ATTENDANTS who ready their battle gear for their journey. Loki slips away from the group, speaks to a nearby GUARD. Hogun notices.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We must first find a way to get past Heimdall.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That will be no easy task. It's said the Gatekeeper can see a single dew drop fall from a blade of grass a thousand worlds away.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And he can hear a cricket passing gas in Niffelheim.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Jest not! He heareth all!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Please. Getting past him should be simple enough now, since he seems to be letting Frost Giants sneak by under his nose. Volstagg, terrified, calls out to the sky.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Forgive him! He meaneth no offense! Loki rejoins the group as Thor leads them onward. 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 20A.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . GATE OF ASGARD - DAY 28 Thor and his band of adventurers, on horseback, pass through the massive Gate, leaving Asgard behind. They ride along the most astounding path in this Realm or any other -- THE RAINBOW BRIDGE. 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 21. Wide and flat, it runs straight out from Odin's palace to the mists and black void of space beyond. In the distance far ahead, the Bridge continues on until it reaches Heimdall's Observatory.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . HEIMDALL'S OBSERVATORY - DAY 29 The band draws near the Observatory, where HEIMDALL himself, Gatekeeper of Asgard, stands at his post on the Bridge before them, blocking their way, staring them down. There is something other-worldly about him, even for this Realm. He holds a massive sword in front of him, his stern, intimidating face virtually concealed by armor. Something glints beneath his visor, like twinkling stars.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Keep your weapons sheathed and your mouths closed. This is going to take subtlety and sincerity, not brute strength. Leave it to me. Loki dismounts and steps forward.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: GOOD HEIMDALL-- HEIMDALL You're not dressed warmly enough. Thor, Loki, and the others trade looks.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm sorry?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The freezing cold of Jotunheim. It will kill you all in time, even Thor. (THEN) You think you can deceive me? I, who watch all? I, who can sense the flapping of a butterfly's wings a thousand worlds away? He fixes his eyes pointedly at Fandral.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Or can hear a cricket passing gas in Niffelheim? Fandral looks gob-smacked. 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 22.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That was just a bit of a jest, really... Loki goes into damage control.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You must be mistaken. We're not--
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Enough. (TO HEIMDALL) Heimdall, may we pass? Heimdall stares him down.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: For ages have I guarded Asgard and kept it safe from those who would do it harm. In all that time, never has an enemy slipped by my watch -- until this day. I wish to know how that happened.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Then tell no one where we've gone until we've returned. Thor walks past Heimdall as the Gatekeeper lets the group pass. Volstagg walks beside the frustrated Loki, needles him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What happened? Your silver tongue turn to lead?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Get me off this bridge before it cracks under your girth. Volstagg and Fandral share a laugh.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . HEIMDALL'S OBSERVATORY - DAY 30 Thor and the others enter the Observatory, step onto a platform. Heimdall climbs into the large control apparatus at the center of the room and readies the Observatory. 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 23.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Be warned. I will honor my sworn oath to protect this Realm as its Gatekeeper. If your return threatens the safety of Asgard, Bifrost will remain closed to you. You'll be left to die in the cold wastes of Jotunheim.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I have no plans to die today.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: None do. Heimdall inserts his sword into the control panel, and the apparatus of the Observatory starts up.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . RAINBOW BRIDGE 31 The Bifrost energy quickens along the Bridge, feeding into the Observatory.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . HEIMDALL'S OBSERVATORY 32 Heimdall turns his sword in the control panel. The Observatory's giant turret swings around, aims toward a section of space. As a final step, Heimdall plunges his sword deeper into the control panel. The great turret FIRES, the RAINBOW LIGHT of Bifrost energy blasts out of it. The Bifrost opens at the end of the platform upon which Thor and his five comrades stand.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: All is ready. You may pass.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Couldn't you just leave the bridge open for us?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: To keep this bridge open would unleash the full power of the Bifrost and destroy Jotunheim with you upon it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ah. Never mind, then. Thor starts towards the Bifrost, turns back to the others, grins. 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 23A.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Come on. Don't be bashful. The others join him at his side, then step towards the Bifrost. Their bodies stretch towards the maelstrom, changing shape, as if every atom of their being is being elongated by the pull of it. In an instant, they're jerked off the platform and inside the vortex.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . BIFROST LANDING SITE (JOTUNHEIM) - DAY 33 A hole in the sky rips open, and the Bifrost comes shooting out of it. Snow flurries up when the Bifrost hits, as Thor and his band touch down. RUNES from the Bifrost are imprinted on the ice around them. 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 24. Volstagg loses his footing, falling backwards. Thor quickly grabs him by the belt. We see the warrior dangling precariously on the edge of a sheer cliff on the planet's inner ring, opening up to the black abyss of space beyond.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Come on, big fella. Up...! With an effort, Thor pulls the burly warrior back onto the ice and, tremendously relieved, he proclaims:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This belt! This belt is now my lucky belt! I will never remove it! Even when bathing!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You bathe? Thor and the others turn and stare out in horror and wonder at the frozen alien wasteland before them. The whole planet is a massive flattened ring of jagged ice, slowly breaking apart. Huge CHUNKS OF ICE calve away from its outer edges and float off into space. The planet's icy surface cracks and melts as far as the eye can see. The ruins of a Jotun city lies in the distance.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We shouldn't be here.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Too late now.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Actually, it's not. We could turn right around, hop back to Asgard, share a mug by the fire. Could be nice. Thor ignore him, heads off. Loki looks around, anxious.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Perhaps we should wait. Thor turns back to his brother.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: For what?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: To survey the enemy. To gauge their strengths and weaknesses from a distance. 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 25.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm liking that. Gauging, surveying. Particularly the distance part.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We know all we must. It's time to act. Thor heads on. Reluctantly, the others follow.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He's just got to swing his hammer...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . JOTUNHEIM - DAY 34 The group trudges behind Thor across the frozen wasteland, shielding themselves from the howling wind and cold. Loki looks around them, anxious. Volstagg shivers. Thor, invigorated, turns back to his comrades.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It feels good, doesn't it? To be together again, adventuring on another world?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Adventuring? Is that what we're doing?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What would you call it?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Freezing.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Starving.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Whining.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: How about a song to lift our spirits? The others groan.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No, not that! 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 25A.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Please don't make us sing again!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: If I have to listen to Volstagg's singing voice one more time, I'll fall on my own sword!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well, now I'm on board. She and Thor share a grin. The party reaches the edge of the city -- its ancient structures of jade and ice melting and crumbling, ravaged by warfare long ago. A TEMPLE lies before them, across a central plaza.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Where are they?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hiding. As cowards always do. Thor leads the others onwards towards the central plaza. Loki reluctantly follows. They don't notice as SHADOWY FIGURES move in the shadows of the structures nearby.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . CENTRAL PLAZA - DAY 35 The party reaches the plaza. They sense the Frost Giants in the shadows and crevices, surrounding them now on all sides. The Asgardians reach for the hilts of their weapons.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: calls to him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What is your business here, Asgardian? The Jotun's voice itself sounds like cracking ice. 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 26.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I speak only to your King. Not to his foot soldiers.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (O.S.) Then speak. Thor turns towards the source in a balcony of the temple, where LAUFEY sits, veiled in shadow, behind a cascading waterfall. The Jotun King is ancient, noble, powerful -- too proud to reveal even a hint of the years of suffering he and his people have endured.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I am Laufey, King of this Realm.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And I am--
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We know who you are, Odinson. Why have you brought the stench of your blood into my world?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I demand answers. Laufey stands, sizing up Thor, tries to piece this together.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You "demand?"
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: How did your people get into Asgard?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The house of Odin is full of traitors. Sif and the Warriors Three exchange a puzzled look, disturbed by the Jotun King's words.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Do not dishonor my father's name with your lies.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Your father is a murderer and a thief. He stole what was ours, and left our world in ruins. We have the right to reclaim the Casket. 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 27.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Not when you'd use it to make war against other Realms. Laufey laughs, cold, mocking.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And why have you come here? To make peace? You long for battle. You crave it. I see you for what you are, Thor Odinson. Nothing but a boy, trying to prove himself a man.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This boy has grown tired of your mockery. Thor takes a step towards Laufey. The other Jotuns step in front of Thor, blocking his path. We finally see the Frost Giants now -- terrifying, blue-skinned, standing eight feet tall. Loki moves next to his brother and quietly implores him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Thor, stop and think. Look around you. We are outnumbered.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Know your place, brother...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You should listen to his counsel. You know not what your actions would unleash. Laufey steps out of the shadows.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: But I do. Go now, while I still allow it. Thor simmers. Loki speaks up.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We will accept your most gracious offer. The others look to Thor imploringly. Thor stares Laufey down a beat -- then relents. He turns to leave. His comrades breathe a sigh of relief and follow, when a Frost Giant nearby mutters under his breath. 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 28.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Run back home, little princess. Thor stops in his tracks. Loki goes white. He knows what's coming.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Damn. In one quick move, Thor pulls Mjolnir, swings it, and KNOCKS the Jotun clear across the plaza. The Asgardians reluctantly draw their weapons, gather into a circle around Thor. Volstagg looks around at the angry Jotuns approaching them.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Silly hammer! Has a mind of its own!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: forms on the Jotuns' bodies, creating a FROZEN ARMOR around them, extending off the ends of their arms like
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . One Giant does so directly in front of Fandral.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm hoping that's just decorative. Thor leaves the circle of Asgardians, swings at another Frost Giant. His comrades form another circle around him, separating him from the Jotuns, as he whirls his hammer around once and catches it with a cocky grin. He's enjoying this.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Next! Fandral calls to Volstagg and Hogun.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well? What move, do you think?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I say we use "The Norn's Revenge."
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: At this close range? I think "The Alfheim Lunge" is a better move.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Maybe if they were three feet tall! No! How about "The Randy Valkyrie"? 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 28A.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Shut up! Thor takes out yet another Frost Giant, then all hell breaks loose as the Asgardians and Jotuns begin to battle. A Jotun backs Hogun up against a wall of ice. As the Giant hurls an ice blade fist at him, the grim warrior swings his mace over his head, embedding it into the ice wall, and hoists himself up, dodging the Giant's blow and leaping over him. Hogun takes out a second approaching Frost Giant, spins back, dodges a swing from the first, then pounds the Jotun with his mace. Nearby, Sif expertly stabs one Jotun after another with her double-bladed staff. One knocks her viciously to the ground.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: If you don't treat me like a lady, I won't act like a lady! She takes out the Jotun. Loki backs away from an approaching Jotun, finds himself at the edge of a deep crevasse. The Giant sees he's vulnerable, swipes at him. But the Jotun's arm passes right through him. The Giant stands there, confused, when THE REAL LOKI comes out from behind a structure and shoves the Giant into the crevasse below. The false Loki dissipates into nothingness.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (to the falling Giant) Pathetic. He turns back to the battle. Two Jotuns come at him from either side. He lets two daggers fly, felling both Giants at once. Laufey nods to one of his guards -- a massive Jotun BRUTE. The Brute leaps down from the balcony, icing himself up, then punches his giant fist into the ice beneath his feet. It's a long-range attack, causing PILLARS OF ICE to explode out in front of Hogun, sending the grim warrior flying back. Across the plaza, Thor easily dispatches some Jotuns.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Come on! At least make it a challenge for me! He sees the Brute coming at him. The huge Jotun lands a tremendous blow, sending Thor back across the ice. Thor rises, grins. 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 28B.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Now that's more like it! He throws Mjolnir with all his strength, knocking the Brute head over heels. Thor raises his hand. Mjolnir slows in mid-air, then flies back to his grasp.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (re: the fallen Brute) Ugly and stupid. Sif takes out a couple Frost Giants, but she's knocked to the ground by another. It raises its weapon above her. Hogun sees Sif in danger. He pulls a HIDDEN KNIFE from his sleeve and hurls it at Sif's attacker, hitting him square in the chest. The Jotun falls dead.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (to Hogun, re: knife) I'm so glad I taught him how to do that! Volstagg grapples with a Frost Giant, getting a couple good hits in.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You may want to put some ice on that! The Frost Giant fights back, but Volstagg manages to grip in a headlock just as another comes up on him from behind. Volstagg fends him off, then turns the first one loose.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You may be taller, but I'm wider! Volstagg launches his mighty belly at the Jotun and sends him flying. Another Jotun grabs Volstagg, squeezing him tightly and sending him crashing to the ground.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's not too late for you to surrender. Volstagg recovers and fights on. The Jotun grabs Volstagg's bare arm. The warrior's skin begins to freeze from the Jotun's grasp, a BLACKNESS spreading from it, necrotizing Volstagg's flesh. The warrior SHOUTS in pain. 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 28C. Volstagg head-butts the Frost Giant, shattering the Jotun's ice helmet and dropping him to the ground. Winded, he takes a seat upon one of the fallen Jotun's bodies to catch his breath. As the battle rages around him, he opens a secret compartment at the end of his weapon, takes out a small FLASK. Volstagg grimaces in pain, sees his blackened skin. He yells to his comrades.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Don't let them grab hold of you! He takes a swig, enjoying the brief respite, then rejoins the battle. Volstagg stabs his blade in a Giant's chest, but the sword stops mid ice layer. The Giant delivers a bone-breaking blow to Volstagg's face, and the warrior drops to one knee. Sif sees Volstagg in trouble and rushes towards him. In one quick move, she leaps up and off of Volstagg's back, using her boot to plunge Volstagg's blade deep into the Giant's chest, standing atop him as he falls backwards to the ground.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (on his belly) Thank you, my lady. But I nearly had him!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Of course you did. Nearby, a Frost Giant forms a BARRAGE OF ICE BULLETS, hurling them at Sif. Sif raises her shield barely in time, as the bullets go pinging and ricocheting off it. She races into the group of Frost Giants who attacked her and takes them out. 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 29. A Frost Giant touches a pool of standing water. It FLASH- FREEZES Hogun's feet to the ground. Volstagg notices, hurries over, dispatching Jotuns as he goes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hang on! Volstagg swings his weapon, wildly hacking at the ice around Hogun's legs to free him. Hogun looks down, suddenly worried, as Volstagg's blade cuts deep -- and perilously close to hacking into Hogun's legs.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Watch the legs!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Right. Sorry. Volstagg chips away at the ice more carefully, finally freeing Hogun's feet. Fandral sword fights with a Frost Giant.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You really think your icicles are a match for Asgardian steel? Fandral lunges at the Giant. The Jotun knocks his blade away.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Fair enough. Fandral moves on him again, but the Giant grabs Fandral's sword and snaps it in half.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Could we stop just a moment while I get another sword? Fandral fights the Giant with his broken sword. The Jotun then lunges at Fandral, who ducks just in time, grabs hold of the Giant's sword and redirects it, stabbing the Giant through with his own weapon. The Jotun staggers back, then reaches down and swipes at a pool of water, sending up a spray that freezes in mid-air, forming into an ICE STALAGMITE. It impales Fandral, rendering him helpless. 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 29A. Loki races towards the impaled Fandral, throwing daggers and felling Frost Giants as he goes. He reaches the nearly- unconscious warrior, when other Jotuns approach. He fights them off. Volstagg looks across the plaza and sees the impaled Fandral.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That's unfortunate. He hurries to his wounded comrade.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I may need a bit of help. Not a good look, is it?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Just try not to bleed.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: How's the face?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Flawless. Volstagg begins to pull the bleeding Fandral off the ice stalagmite. Loki plunges two daggers into the chest of one of the Frost Giants. The Giant grabs hold of Loki's gloved wrists. Loki pulls his hands free of the gloves, which are still in the Giant's grasp, revealing Loki's skin beneath. The wounded Jotun sees his chance, grabs hold of Loki's bare arm. Loki looks at his arm, prepared for the worst. But instead of the blackness of necrotizing flesh, Loki's arm turns BLUE -- like the Frost Giant's own skin. The blueness spreads painlessly up Loki's arm. He stares at it, confused. The Frost Giant is thrown as well, distracted by the unexpected phenomenon. Loki takes advantage of the distraction, KICKS the Giant. 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 30. Thor continues fighting, his blood lust rising. He taunts the Jotuns around him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Come on! But when he hurls his hammer to take out a Jotun, the Frost Giants seize the opportunity. A group of Jotuns swarm Thor from all sides, keeping him separate from his weapon. Mjolnir falls to the ground. A Frost Giant desperately struggles to lift Mjolnir off the ground, to no avail. Now free, the wounded Fandral looks relieved as Volstagg slings him over his shoulder, and the warriors start to leave. From his balcony, Laufey looks upon the battlefield, decides it's time to pull out the big guns. He touches a wall of the palace. An ENERGY WAVE sweeps from his touch, across the wall of the palace, and down to the ground below. The Asgardians hear a foreboding CRACK OF ICE below their feet.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That can't be good.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes, it could! Might be an early spring! They look down, suddenly filled with dread when they see shadowy figures moving in the ice -- dozens of JOTUN WARRIORS awakening beneath the surface, rousing to join the battle. Loki turns to his brother, who battles a group of the Giants. 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 31.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Thor, we must go! Thor, still without his hammer, fights his Jotun foes mercilessly, a man consumed by blood lust. Loki sees the look on his brother's face -- the savage thrill of the heat of battle.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Then go!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: There are too many of them!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I can stop them! The others hesitate. Jotuns break up through the ice all around them.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Thor! But Thor ignores his comrades, continues fighting.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Run! Reluctantly, the group flees back toward the inner edge of the planet as the Giants break up through the ice and give chase. Thor battles valiantly, but there's just too many of them. The Frost Giants swarm him from all sides now, as he disappears beneath a pile of blue flesh and ice. After a
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Forces its way up through the middle of the pile of Jotuns. He opens his hand, beckoning. One of Thor's attackers hears something ROARING up behind him. He whirls around -- BAM! -- Mjolnir nails him square in the face, then flies into Thor's outstretched hand. Thor raises the hammer up high, and brings it down on the ground with all his might.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ! Lightning strikes down from the sky, the hammer channeling the blast, firing the electricity out at the Jotuns around him. They're blasted back in a massive shockwave. The Jotuns convulse, drop dead to the ground. 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 32. But the force of the blast also cracks the ice below, the shockwave continuing to spread outwards. It moves out to where his comrades are running, breaking up the ground beneath them, exposing the black void of space below.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What's Thor done?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Likely killed us all! As the Jotuns race towards the Asgardians, they open their mouths wide and breathe out an ICY FOG. The swirling mists quickly engulf the fleeing Asgardians before them. The Asgardians stand in the mist, unable to see. Hogun takes a step back, the ice cracking beneath him. They dare not move, for fear of falling through, into the void below. Thor sees he's put his friends in even greater danger. He raises Mjolnir high, SUMMONING THE WINDS. They lift him off the ground and carry him across the frozen wasteland to his comrades.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . BIFROST LANDING SITE (JOTUNHEIM) - DAY 35A Thor lands beside his comrades in the shroud of mists.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Loki, we have to see. Loki raises his arms, concentrates, the mists dissipating. But as they do, the Asgardians see before them the faces of the Frost Giants. And there are HUNDREDS of them -- too many, even for a Thunder God.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Actually, could you bring the mists back, please? Thor realizes that he and his comrades are as good as dead. The Giants move in for the kill, when they hear a deafening
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . A hole in the sky opens up, and the Bifrost blasts down onto the inner edge of the planet. Out of the maelstrom comes the sound of THUNDERING HOOVES, and, to the shock of all, tearing across the frozen wasteland comes -- ODIN ALLFATHER Astride his powerful, eight-legged steed SLEIPNIR. He's clad in battle armor, Gungnir in his hand -- an imposing sight. 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 32A. The Giants part in fear as he thunders into their ranks, stopping before Laufey and the Asgardians. Laufey slams his fists into the ground, and the ice beneath his feet raises him towards Odin. The Asgardians start to react, thinking it's an attack, but Laufey just stands face- to-face with Odin. Asgardian and Jotun alike look on uneasily, unsure what's about to happen. Laufey sizes up Odin, notices that as powerful as the Allfather still is, the years have taken their toll. He's not the foe he once was. The two rulers talk quietly, out of earshot of the others.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Laufey. End this.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Your boy sought this out. 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 33.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You're right. These are the actions of a boy. Treat them as such. You and I can stop this before there's further bloodshed. Unseen by Odin and the others, Laufey starts to form an ice blade at the end of his arm.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We are beyond diplomacy now, Allfather. He'll get what he came for -- war and death. Odin looks grim, determined.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: So be it. Without warning, Laufey swings his ice blade at Odin, but Odin is quicker. The Allfather brings his spear down upon the ice. Laufey and the nearest Jotuns go falling backwards in a wave, the ice cracking beneath their feet. The other Frost Giants turn tail and run. Thor watches the fleeing Jotuns with delight.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Now! We'll finish them together!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Silence! Odin raises his spear. The hole in the sky opens, the Bifrost energy blasting forth from it. The Bifrost envelops the Asgardians, yanks them off the ground and up through the hole. The vortex closes behind them as all falls silent. Laufey stares up after them contemptuously.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . HEIMDALL'S OBSERVATORY - DAY 36 Heimdall stands at the Observatory controls. Odin pulls Heimdall's sword from the control panel and throws it to him. Heimdall backs away.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Why did you bring us back?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Do you realize what you've done? What you've started? 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 33A.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I was protecting my home. 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 34.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You cannot protect your friends. How can you hope to protect a kingdom? Odin turns to the others.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (RE: FANDRAL) Get him to the healing room! Sif, Volstagg, and Hogun hurry to help Fandral out of the room.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: There won't be a kingdom to protect if you're afraid to act! Odin stares at him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Whatever the cost, the world must know that the new King of Asgard will not be held in contempt.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That's pride and vanity that talks! Not leadership! Have you forgotten everything I've taught you? What of a warrior's patience, cunning?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: While you wait and be patient, the Nine Realms laugh at us! The old ways are done. You'd stand giving speeches while Asgard falls!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You're a vain, greedy, cruel boy!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And you are an old man and a fool! The whole world seems to stop at Thor's words. Odin falls quiet. When he speaks again, there's something terrifying beneath the calmness of his words.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: A fool, yes! I was a fool to think you were ready. Loki takes a step towards Odin imploringly. 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 34A.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Odin turns and gives Loki a look which stops him in his tracks. 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 35.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Thor Odinson... You have disobeyed the express command of your King. Through your arrogance and stupidity, you have opened these peaceful Realms and innocent lives to the horrors of war. The Allfather plunges Gungnir into Observatory's control panel. The turret turns, the Bifrost energy building along with Odin's rage. It FIRES, as the Bifrost opens at the end of the platform, creating a portal behind Thor. Odin turns angrily to his son.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You are unworthy of this Realm... Odin RIPS a disc off Thor's chest.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...unworthy of your title... He rips away Thor's cloak.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...unworthy of the loved ones you've betrayed. I hereby take from you your powers. Odin extends his hand towards his son. Mjolnir goes flying from Thor's grasp into Odin's hand.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: In the name of my father...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: comes off the hammer and hits Thor, disintegrating the right arm of his armor and part of the chest piece.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...and of his father before... Another strike disintegrates the remainder of Thor's armor, including the cape and torn-away disc on the floor.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I cast you out! Odin thrusts Mjolnir before him and -- with a CRACK OF THUNDER -- Thor is hurled backwards into the open Bifrost and disappears in the vortex. 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 35A. Odin holds Mjolnir in his hand, stares at it bitterly. He closes his eyes, lost in contemplation, whispers something quietly.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (WHISPERING) Whosoever holds this hammer, if he be worthy, shall possess the power of Thor.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: appear on the side of the hammer, as if carved into its smooth surface. The runes linger for but a moment, then disappear. Suddenly, Odin turns and hurls the hammer into the Bifrost.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . BIFROST LANDING SITE (EARTH) - NIGHT 37 Thor opens his eyes, surrounded by darkness. Suddenly, he's blinded by bright headlights of a vehicle -- an SUV. It swerves, the side of it coming straight at him. It SLAMS into him, as we:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 36. After a beat, we hear familiar voices.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (V.O.) I think that was legally your fault.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (V.O.) Get the first aid kit. (THEN) Come on, big guy. Do me a favor and don't be dead, okay? Open your eyes and look at me.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Thor opens his eyes to see Jane Foster staring at him, concerned. She looks vulnerable and beautiful.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (O.S.) Wow. Does he need CPR? Because I know CPR.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: TIME CUT TO: Jane regretfully watches the storm EVAPORATE above their heads. A thought strikes her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Where did he come from? They exchange puzzled looks when Thor GROANS again. He sits up abruptly, and Jane topples backwards in surprise. Thor staggers groggily to his feet, then turns and offers Jane a hand up. She takes it hesitantly, and he easily pulls her up. She can't help but marvel at his strength.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Uh, thanks. Are you okay? Thor searches the ground.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hammer...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah, we can tell you're hammered. That's pretty obvious. Jane notices something on the ground around them. She shines her flashlight down at the sand. 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 36A.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Erik... look at this. He joins her at her side and sees it. A faint, discernible pattern is etched into the sand. They exchange a look. Amazed and excited, Jane hurriedly takes out a camera and snaps some photos of the runes. A breeze begins to blow them away.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We've got to move fast before anything changes. (MORE) 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 37.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We need soil samples, light readings, everything. She pulls out a light meter, holds it up, takes some readings, jots them down in her notebook. Selvig looks at Thor, who stares up at the sky.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Jane, we need get him to a hospital. Jane kneels and quickly scoops up a soil sample in the cannister.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Not right now. It'll take too long. County's an hour away. We'll drop him off after we're done here. Selvig looks uncertain.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (RE: THOR) Look at him, he's fine. Thor stares up at the stars, shouts up at them angrily.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Father! Heimdall! I know you can hear me! Open the bridge!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (off Selvig's look) Okay, you and Darcy take him to the hospital, I'll stay here.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You expect me to leave you alone in the middle of the desert? Thor turns to the others, frustrated.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You! What world is this? The group is intimidated by his fervor.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's all right, my friend. We're going to get you some help. Selvig touches Thor's shoulder. Thor shoves him off, grows agitated, belligerent. 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 37A.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Where am I?! Answer me! Darcy reaches into her fanny pack, pulls something out of it. Jane looks on, concerned. 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 38.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Erik, just back away...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (to Thor, calming) You're in the desert outside the town of Puente Antiguo.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What Realm?! Alfheim? Nornheim?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Uh... New Mexico? Darcy raises a TASER at him. Thor looks at the weapon, unsure what to make of it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You dare threaten Thor with so puny
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Darcy fires, the electrified wires shooting out of the taser,
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: him in the chest. Thor convulses, falls to the ground unconscious. Jane and Selvig stare at her, shocked.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What? He was freaking me out.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . BIFROST LANDING SITE (EARTH) - MOMENTS LATER 38 As Jane still takes soil samples, Darcy and Selvig struggle to drag an unconscious Thor to the SUV and lift him inside.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Next time you decide to taser someone, do me a favor and make sure they're already inside the truck. (TO JANE) Jane, come on... Reluctantly, Jane joins the others inside the SUV.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . DESERT - MOMENTS LATER 39 The SUV heads off into the distance. Behind it, high overhead, a HOLE opens in the sky. A last blast of Bifrost energy bursts forth from it, and a small OBJECT comes firing into our world. It BURNS across the desert sky like a meteor.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 39.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . COUNTY HOSPITAL - NIGHT 41 The SUV sits parked before the emergency room entrance.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . COUNTY HOSPITAL ER - NIGHT 42 Selvig watches the unconscious Thor with interest as two
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: set the Asgardian onto a gurney. Jane and Darcy stand before a sweet, ditzy ADMISSIONS NURSE.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Name?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He said it was "Thor." The Nurse painstakingly types it into the computer, one key at a time. Jane watches as Thor is wheeled out of the room.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: T-H-O-R. And your relationship to him?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I've never met him before.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Until she hit him with the car.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Grazed him, actually. (THEN) Oh, and we tasered him, too.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Must have been quite the spat.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I told you, I don't know him. I just want to make sure he's okay.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm going to need a name and contact number.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Jane Foster.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: J...A...N... 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 39A.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, for God's sake... He reaches over Jane's shoulder and hands the Nurse his business card.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Here. Let's go. Selvig, Darcy, and Jane head out. 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 40.
direction.name: direction
