direction.raw_text: . HOSPITAL ER - NIGHT 43 Thor, now in a hospital gown, winces in pain as he awakens on a gurney to find a NURSE standing over him, a syringe in his arm.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hi. Just taking a little blood. Thor SLAPS the syringe away angrily, starts to sit up.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: How dare you attack the son of Odin!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I need some help! Two ORDERLIES race over, try to hold Thor down.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We're trying to help you!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Then bring me a healing stone, you savages! He hurls one of them off, smashing against a wall. Now a couple SECURITY GUARDS and MALE NURSES join the fracas, all struggling to hold Thor down. Medical equipment goes flying, furniture overturned.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What the hell is this guy on? Finally, they force him back down onto the gurney. Thor looks shocked and amazed that he's actually being overpowered by this small group. The NURSE injects him with a sedative.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You're no match for the Mighty-- Thor struggles a beat, then passes out.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . NEW MEXICO DESERT - DAWN 44 Smoke rises from a fifty foot wide CRATER. A TOWNIE pulls his pick-up to a stop at the crater's edge. He climbs out, peers down below, his curiosity piqued by what he sees.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Huh. 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 40A. The Townie approaches something at the center of the crater. We don't see what it is, but it bathes him in an otherworldly, BLUE LUMINOUS GLOW. He reaches for the object, tries to lift it, but can't. He redoubles his efforts, strains with all his might, with no luck. He takes off his hat, fans himself, stares at the mysterious object. 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 41.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Huh.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ./INT. SMITH MOTORS - LAB - MORNING 45 The distant mountains glint snow in the early morning light. Selvig appears with a cup of coffee and surveys the vast desert. He turns back into the lab and sees Jane, busy at her workstation, soldering a piece of equipment. A printer churns out blown-up screen-cap PHOTOS of the Bifrost footage. Darcy hangs them on the wall. Selvig surveys the scene, watches how Jane works, impressed. He notices a monitor which displays a complex program entitled "J. FOSTER ALGORITHM ANALYSIS". He looks proud. The three of them have been up all night, fueled by caffeine and excitement.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Darcy, when you're done, take the soil samples to Professor Meyers in geology. Remind him, he owes me.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We might want to perform a spectral analysis.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: "We?"
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I flew all the way out here -- might as well make myself useful. This is the offer Jane's been waiting for. She gets up, inserts the piece of equipment she's been working on into a rack-mounted server.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You know what would be really useful? Do you still have that friend at LIGO?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: She was more than a friend.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Could you call in a favor?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You don't think this was just a magnetic storm? 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 41A.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: If I'm right, their observatory must have picked up gravitational waves during last night's event.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Meaning? Jane heads over to a computer monitor. Selvig follows.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Meaning these anomalies might signify something bigger.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: How "big" are we talking about? Jane indicates the footage on the monitor. As the last of the Bifrost cloud disappears into the night sky, there appears to be a blister in space, bulging out in convex and covered with stars.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I think the lensing around the edges is characteristic of an Einstein-Rosen Bridge.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: A what?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I thought you were a science major.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Political Science. Selvig shoots Jane a confused look. Jane shrugs.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: She was the only applicant.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: An Einstein-Rosen Bridge -- a "theoretical" connection between two different points of space-time. Darcy stares blankly.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: A wormhole. 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 41B. Selvig looks skeptical. Jane prints out a frame-grab off the monitor.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Erik, look... 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 42. Jane indicates the print-out showing the constellations seen through the "bubble" in the clouds.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What do you see here?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Stars.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes. But not our stars. She spreads out a STAR CHART, barely able to contain her excitement.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This is the star alignment for our quadrant, this time of year. So unless Ursa Minor decided to take the day off... those are someone else's constellations. Selvig's intrigued, in spite of himself. Darcy pulls another frame-grab of the Bifrost footage from the printer and hangs it on the wall, when something in the image catches her eye.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hey, check it out. Jane and Selvig examine the photo, amazed.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Is that...?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I think I left something at the hospital. As Jane walks away, we REVEAL the photo. Inside the Bifrost funnel cloud is a FIGURE -- the vague, but unmistakable shape of a MAN.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . ODIN'S CHAMBERS - DAY 45A At the top of the palace, we see a small FIGURE on the balcony. As we move closer, we see it is a burdened Odin, looking out over Asgard.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . ODIN'S CHAMBERS - DAY 46 Frigga enters to find Odin standing lost in thought. 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 42A.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: How could you have done this?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Do you understand what he set in motion? He's taken us to the brink of war!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: But banishment? You would lose him forever? He's your son!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What would you have done? 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 43.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I would not have exiled him to a world of mortals, stripped of his powers, to suffer alone. I would not have had the heart for such cruelty!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That is why I'm King. (THEN)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: too, grieve the loss of our son. But there are some things that even I cannot undo.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You can bring him back.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No. His fate is in his own hands now.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . HOSPITAL ROOM - DAY 47 Thor awakens on a hospital bed. He notices RESTRAINTS on his wrists now. He pulls at them, tries to free himself, to no avail.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's not possible. He tries again, mustering all his strength. One of his hands slips free from its restraint.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . COUNTY HOSPITAL ER - DAY 47A Jane again faces the Admissions Nurse, with Selvig and Darcy nearby.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm sorry, only relatives can visit patients.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: But... I'm his wife. Darcy stifles a SNICKER at this, as the Nurse looks doubtful.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I thought you said you didn't know him. 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 43A.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I meant I barely know him anymore. The man he's become. He's changed. I mean, what woman really knows her husband, anyway?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: None of us, dear. He's in Room
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . HOSPITAL CORRIDOR - DAY 48 Jane, Selvig, and Darcy head down the corridor, passing the destruction of the ER Thor wrecked the previous night. 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 44. They enter Thor's room.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . HOSPITAL ROOM 49 They step inside to find Thor's bed empty.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . HOSPITAL PARKING LOT - DAY 50 Jane, Selvig, and Darcy quickly climb into Jane's SUV.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . JANE'S SUV 51 Jane starts the car, frustrated.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Typical. I just lost my most important piece of evidence.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: So now what?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We find him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Did you see what he did in there? I don't know if finding him is the best idea.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I want to know what that thing was, and he may have the answers. We don't have a choice.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oo-kay. She pulls out her taser and a can of mace.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: So we're just going to spend the rest of the day looking for him?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: However long it takes. Jane puts the car in reverse and backs up, when -- BAM! She collides with Thor again, dressed in stolen hospital scrubs. Jane and Selvig exchange a look. 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 44A.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . HOSPITAL PARKING LOT - DAY 52 Jane and Selvig emerge from the SUV, help Thor to his feet.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm so sorry. I swear I'm not doing that on purpose. 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 45. Thor looks up at the sky.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Blue sky... one sun... This is Earth, isn't it?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I think you may have hit him with the car one time too many.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Let's get you some clothes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . HEALING ROOM - DAY 53 Sif, Loki, and the Warriors three, battered and shell- shocked, still reeling from the day's events, sit before a
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: central fire. Hogun reaches into the flames, pulls out some fragile HEALING STONES. Neither the fire, nor the stones burn him. As he carefully places the stones over the wounds of his comrades, the stones begin to glow. He crushes them to a powder. His comrades' injuries heal up at the glowing powder's touch. Fandral winces in pain as Hogun heals his gaping wound. Volstagg looks at the skin on his arm -- healing, but still blackened from the necrotizing touch of the Frost Giant. Loki watches him, then stares at his own arm, where the Giant's touch turned his skin blue. It's undamaged, back to its normal color.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We should never have let him go.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: There was no stopping him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: At least he's only banished, not dead. Which is what we'd all be if that guard hadn't told Odin where we'd gone.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: How did the guard even know? Loki stares at his arm.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I told him. 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 45A.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I told him to go to Odin after we'd left. Though he should be flogged for taking so long. 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 46.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You told the guard?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I saved our lives! And Thor's. I had no idea Father would banish him for what he did.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Loki, you're the only one who can help Thor now. You must go to the Allfather and convince him to change his mind!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And if I do, then what? I love Thor more dearly than any of you, but you know what he is. He's arrogant. He's reckless. He's dangerous. You saw how he was today. Is that what Asgard needs from its King? The others exchange glances, torn. Loki has a point. He leaves the room. Hogun stares after him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He may speak about the good of Asgard, but he's always been jealous of Thor.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: True, but we should be grateful to him. He did save our lives.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Laufey said there were traitors in the House of Odin. The others turn to the usually quiet Hogun.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Why is it every time you choose to speak, it has to be something dark and ominous?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: A master of magic could easily bring three Jotuns into Asgard. The others look to Hogun, understanding the implication.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No! Surely not! 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 46A.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Loki's always been one for mischief, but you're talking about something else entirely. 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 47.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Who else could elude Heimdall's gaze with tricks of light and shadow?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The ceremony was interrupted just before Thor was named King.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We should go to the Allfather.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And tell him what? "Oh, by the way, we think your son just betrayed the throne. And do us a favor. Bring back Thor. There's a good fellow!"
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's our duty. If any of our suspicions are right, then all of Asgard is in danger.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . VAULT - DAY 54 Loki heads into the Vault, sees the Casket of Ancient Winters sitting on its stand. He walks over to it slowly, reaches out to it, lifts it between his forearms off its pedestal. As he does, a blueness spreads from his arms, across his body. The latticework behind the Casket starts to separate, the Destroyer rousing. A fire starts to glow within its black metal armor, as it rattles to life, but Loki ignores it -- the blueness spreading further, consuming his whole body. 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 48.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (O.S.) Stop! Loki turns, sees Odin hurrying into the room, the Destroyer goes motionless, the latticework rejoining before it. Odin eyes Loki with dismay.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Am I cursed?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No. Put the Casket down. Loki sets the Casket back upon its pedestal, his body quickly returning to its normal form and color. He stares at his father.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What am I?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You're my son.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What more than that? Odin doesn't answer. He looks suddenly weary, burdened. Loki sizes him up, realizes the truth.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The Casket wasn't the only thing you took from Jotunheim that day, was it? Odin looks him in the eye. He can deny it no longer.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No. (BEAT) In the aftermath of the battle, I went into the Temple, and I found a baby. Small for a giant's offspring -- abandoned, suffering, left to die. Laufey's son. Loki is sent reeling by the revelation.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Laufey's son... He desperately struggles to make sense of it all. 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 48A.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Why? You were knee-deep in Jotun blood. Why would you take me?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You were an innocent child.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You took me for a purpose, what was it? Odin doesn't answer.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Tell me!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I thought we could unite our kingdoms one day, bring about an alliance, bring about a permanent peace... through you. But those plans no longer matter.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: So I am no more than another stolen relic, locked up here until you might have use of me.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Why do you twist my words?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You could have told me what I was from the beginning. Why didn't you?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You are my son. My blood. I wanted only to protect you from the truth.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Because I am the monster parents tell their children about at night?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Don't...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It all makes sense now. Why you favored Thor all these years.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Listen... 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 48B.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Because no matter how much you claim to "love" me, you could never have a Frost Giant sitting on the Throne of Asgard! Odin's body begins to shake, he lifts his hand. It starts to move out of synch temporarily, leaving a trail, the effect of the Odinsleep approaching. Loki doesn't notice as Odin tries to fight it off.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Listen to me! Loki strides away towards the exit.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Loki! Odin starts towards him, when the enormous mental, emotional, and physical strain of recent events finally takes its toll. The effect of the Odinsleep consumes him. His entire body now moves out of sync with the rest of the world, leaving trails behind him as he staggers backwards. Odin falls back against a wall, his face contorting in a scream. He collapses to the stone floor. Loki, shocked, hurries to him. He takes Odin in his arms, calls out.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Guards!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 49.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 50.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . OUTSIDE OF CRATER - DAY 58 Cars, pick-ups, and SUVs are parked around the crater, the sound of a BOISTEROUS PARTY coming from within. 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 51.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . INSIDE OF CRATER 59 It looks like the whole town has turned out. LOCALS sit on lounge chairs, drink beer from coolers, laugh and talk. They watch the center of the crater, where LARGE MEN have formed a line to take a turn with the mysterious object. One of them struggles and fails to lift it. As he gives up, the next man steps up and takes his turn, straining from the effort. Other Townies SNAP PICTURES of the scene with their cell phones. They hear an approaching RUMBLE, then clear a path as a large
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: backs its way down the crater's edge. An EAGER TOWNIE hops out the passenger side and pulls a thick chain from the back of the truck. He fastens one end around the object, then securely affixes the chain to the bumper and the rear of the undercarriage.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This'll do it. He yells to the driver.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Okay, let 'er rip! The townsfolk watch as the pick-up's engine ROARS, then
direction.name: direction

result.heading: -- ON THE CRATER'S EDGE ABOVE THEM

direction.raw_text: its wheels spinning futilely, until finally the rear of the truck, along with the back wheels and axles, break off and go flying. People dive out of the way. The PICK-UP DRIVER sticks his head out. He is STAN "THE MAN" LEE. He looks back, shocked. The townsfolk laugh, the party continuing. They don't notice as -- ON THE CRATER'S EDGE ABOVE THEM An imposing GOVERNMENT VEHICLE pulls up to a stop. A Fed in a suit climbs out, peers down at the boisterous gathering below, his eyes fixed on the object at the center of the crater. He is SHIELD AGENT COULSON. He stares down at the object which glows with an otherworldly blue energy -- MJOLNIR. He pulls out a phone.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sir -- we've found it. 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 51A.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . SMITH MOTORS - LAB - DAY 60 In a back room, Thor, now shirtless and wearing jeans, looks around for a t-shirt. Jane and Darcy, standing in the lab, can't help but notice his reflection in the mirror. Darcy eyes his powerful build, rippling biceps.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You know, for a crazy homeless guy, he's pretty cut. Jane turns away. Thor emerges from the back room, holding a t-shirt.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hey, sorry I tased you! Thor heads over to Jane's work area, starts fiddling with the equipment there with interest. Jane hurries over to put a stop to it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Excuse me... excuse me! She leads him away from the work station. Thor holds up the t-shirt. On the front, it bear a sticker which reads:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . DONALD BLAKE". Thor looks at it, puzzled. Jane rips the sticker off. 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 52.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: My ex. Thor stares at her a beat.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They're the only clothes I had that'll fit you. Sorry.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They will suffice. Thor turns his attention to the pictures of the Bifrost on the wall.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You're welcome. Now tell me... Thor studies the frame-grabs with interest. Jane points to his form in the Bifrost photo.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What were you doing, in that? He glances at it, dismissive.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What does anyone do in the Bifrost? Everyone stares at him. Selvig seems to recognize the word. Jane opens her notebook, quickly writes the word down. Thor moves close to her, eyes the notations and drawings within the book, curious.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (amused, skeptical) The Bifrost... Jane starts to get uncomfortable with Thor standing so close to her, looking over her notations. She quickly closes the book.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What exactly is the Bifrost?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This mortal form has grown weak.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 52A.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Somebody get the mortal a Pop-Tart.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . ODIN'S CHAMBERS - DAY 61 Frigga sits at her husband's bedside, holding his hand. Odin lies there -- looking pale and lifeless, his body and the space around it warped from the effect of the Odinsleep. The walls of the chamber have moved close around him, protecting him like a dark crypt, sealing off any daylight. Loki sits at Odin's side, across from Frigga. She speaks softly to him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I asked him to be honest with you from the beginning. There should be no secrets in a family.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: So why did he lie?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He kept the truth from you so that you would never feel different. You are in every way our son, Loki, and we your family. You must know that. Loki takes this in, stares at Odin.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (RE: ODIN) You can speak to him. He can see and hear us, even now.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: How long will it last? 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 53.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I don't know. This time is different. We were unprepared.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I never get used to seeing him like this. The most powerful being in the Nine Realms lying helpless until his body is restored.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: But he's put it off for so long now, I fear... Loki takes her hand. She's grateful, wipes tears from her eyes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You're a good son. Loki sits there, uncertain how to react, uncertain how he really feels.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We mustn't lose hope that your father will return to us. And your brother. Loki looks to Frigga, concerned.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What hope is there for Thor?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: There's always a purpose to everything your father does. Thor may yet find a way home. Loki looks troubled by the revelation. He rises, heads for the exit, when they hear the clatter of ARMORED FOOTSTEPS hurriedly approaching.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Enter the room, block his way out. Loki tenses, prepared for the worst, but the guards just stand before them. Loki is baffled.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Thor is banished. The line of succession falls to you. Until he awakens, Asgard is yours. 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 53A. The Einherjar kneel before the shocked Loki. Another
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: enters, holding Gungnir before him. He kneels before Loki, offers the spear to him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Make your father proud. Loki reaches out tentatively, then takes it. He likes the feel of it in his hand. 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 54.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . ISABELA'S DINER - MORNING 62 Thor, Selvig, Darcy, and Jane sit at a table in the local diner. Selvig and Darcy watch as Thor eats ravenously from a huge mound of steak and eggs. A couple other full plates -- pancakes and biscuits and gravy -- are piled high before him. Jane's eager, her notebook at the ready.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Now tell us exactly what happened to you last night. Thor looks her in the eyes, staring, intrigued. Jane gets flustered, looks away.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Maybe start with how you got inside that cloud.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And how you could eat an entire box of Pop-Tarts and still be this hungry. Jane shoots her a withering look. Thor downs a cup of coffee.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (re: coffee mug) This drink. I like it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (to Thor, re: coffee) Yeah, it's great, isn't it? Isabela makes the best coffee in town. Thor hurls the empty mug at the ground, SHATTERING it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Another!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: , the diner's proprietor, glares at Thor from behind the counter.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sorry, Izzy. Little accident. (IN SPANISH) Yo voy a pagar la taza. Isabela turns to a WAITRESS and starts venting quickly in Spanish. 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 54A.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Did you see that? The first time she brings a man in here, and he's a lunatic!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (to Thor, re: mug) What was that? He doesn't understand. The other patrons stare at him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It was delicious. I want another.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Then you should just say so!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I just did.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I mean ask for it. Nicely.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I meant no disrespect.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: All right, then no more smashing, deal?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You have my word.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Good. 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 55. A few TOWNIES, looking bedraggled, enter and take a seat at the counter. We recognize them from the crater. (Among them is the Drunk Townie Jake, who is not presently drunk.)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Morning, Pete. Jake.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The usual, please, Izzy. Isabela pours them a couple cups of coffee.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You missed all the excitement out at the crater.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What crater? Jane and Selvig overhear this, exchange a look, turn to the Townies with interest.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They're saying some kind of satellite crashed in the desert.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We were having a good time with it till the Feds showed up, chased us out.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (to the Townies) Excuse me, did you say there was a satellite crash?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yep. They said it was radioactive. And I had my hands all over it. (REALIZING) I'm probably sterile now. Thor, unconcerned, prepares to dig into the giant pile of pancakes. Darcy is amazed by the sight.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh my God, this is going on Facebook. Darcy whips out her cellphone.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (TO THOR) Smile! 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 55A. Thor looks puzzled as she SNAPS a photo of him and his massive stack of food.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (to the Townies) What did the satellite look like?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I don't know nothing about satellites. But it was heavy. Real heavy. Nobody could lift it. This gets Thor's attention. 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 56. Thor springs to his feet, heads over to Drunk Townie Jake, and pulls the Townie around to face him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Where?!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: About twelve miles east of here. Thor grins, his spirits soaring, as he quickly strides out of the diner.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I wouldn't bother! Looked like the whole Army was coming in when we left!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . MAIN STREET - DAY 63 Thor studies the position of the sun, gauging his bearings. Jane, Darcy, and Selvig catch up to him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Where are you going?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Twelve miles east of here. He starts to stride determinedly down the street. Jane walks with him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Why?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: To get what belongs to me.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: So now you own a satellite?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's not what they say it is.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Whatever it is, the government seems to think it's theirs. You intend to just walk in there and take it?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes. He stops walking. 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 57.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: If you take me there now, I'll tell you everything you wish to know.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Everything?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: All the answers you seek will be yours, once I reclaim Mjolnir. Darcy looks to the others.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: "Myeu-muh?" What's "Myeu-muh?" Jane studies Thor. He looks sincere. She's nearly swayed,
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Jane. He pulls her aside. Thor can tell that Selvig doesn't much care for him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (TO JANE) Please don't do this.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You know what we saw last night. This can't be a coincidence. I want to know what's in that crater.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm not talking about the crater. I'm talking about him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He's promised us answers.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He's delusional! Listen to what he's saying! "Thor." "Bifrost." "Mjolnir." These are the stories I grew up with as a child!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'd just be driving him out there, that's all.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's dangerous. He's dangerous. 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 58. After a moment, she nods. They head back over to Thor and Darcy.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm sorry. I can't take you.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I understand. Then this is where we say goodbye. He takes her hand and kisses it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That's... thank you. Thor bows slightly to each of them.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Jane Foster... Erik Selvig... Darcy. Farewell. He heads off down the street. Selvig looks relieved.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Now... let's get back to the lab. We have work to do. Selvig and Darcy turn and start to go. Jane looks after Thor as he walks away down the street.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . ODIN'S PALACE - DAY 64 Sif joins the Warriors Three as they hurry towards the Throne Room.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . THRONE ROOM - MOMENTS LATER 65 Two EINHERJAR GUARDS enter, admitting Sif and the Warriors Three, who burst through the entrance, heads bowed. 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 59.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Allfather, we must speak with you
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: But as they raise their heads, they stop short to see -- LOKI Sitting sprawled upon his father's throne. He wears his horned ceremonial headdress and holds GUNGNIR in his hand. Sif and the others look up, shocked at the sight before them.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What is this?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: My friends... you haven't heard? I am now Ruler of Asgard.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Where is Odin?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Father's fallen into the Odinsleep. My mother fears he may never awaken again.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We would speak with her. Sif and the Warriors Three exchange a look. Loki notices.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: She has refused to leave my father's bedside. You can bring your "urgent" matter to me, your King. Sif covers quickly.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We would ask you to end Thor's banishment. 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 60.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: My first command can not be to undo the Allfather's last. We're on the brink of war with Jotunheim. Our people must have a sense of continuity in order to feel safe in these difficult times. Sif and the Warriors Three trade looks, not liking any of this.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: All of us must stand together, for the good of Asgard.
direction.name: direction

In the back of the vehicle, Jane notices, partially covered by a tarp, the dark matter analysis machine from her lab.

direction.raw_text: . SMITH MOTORS - LAB 66A Jane, Selvig, and Darcy reach the lab, where government vehicles are parked. SHIELD AGENTS haul equipment out of the lab and load it into waiting vans. Other Agents strip all the equipment from inside the Pinzgauer and cart it away. Still others emerge from her trailer, arms loaded with scientific instruments and documents.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What the hell is going on here?! The Agents ignore her as Agent Coulson approaches.

direction.raw_text: Ms. Foster, I'm Agent Coulson, with
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . Selvig, recognizing the name of the organization, grows wary. 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 60A.

direction.raw_text: Then I'm sure you can do it again.

direction.raw_text: And I'm sure I can sue you for violating my constitutional rights! 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 61.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We're the good guys, Ms. Foster. He tries to walk away, but Jane blocks his path. She is fully herself, fueled by outrage.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: So are we! We're on the verge of
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: extraordinary. Jane holds up her notebook.

direction.raw_text: Everything I know about this phenomenon is in this lab and in this book, and no one has the right to take it from me. Coulson gestures to a nearby AGENT, who promptly plucks the notebook out of Jane's hands and adds it to the pile he's carrying. Jane is stunned.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Thank you for your cooperation. He gets into a car. The cars and trucks pull away.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . SMITH MOTORS - LAB - DAY 67 Jane, Selvig, and Darcy enter, staring in shock at the now- empty space.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Years of research, gone. 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 62.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They even took my iPod.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And your back-ups?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Look around! They took our back- ups. They took the back-ups of our back-ups.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I just downloaded, like, thirty songs on there.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Will you please stop talking about your iPod?! (TO SELVIG) Who are these people?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No one knows much about them. But I knew a scientist -- a pioneer in gamma radiation. SHIELD showed up, and he was never heard from again.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm not going to let them do this. I'm getting everything back.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Please, let me contact one of my colleagues. Dr. Pym has had some dealings with these people. I'll e- mail him and see if he can help.

direction.raw_text: They took your laptop, too. Annoyed, Selvig thinks.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . PUENTE ANTIGUO LIBRARY - DAY 67A Selvig and Jane in the Pinzgauer drive up in front of the town's rinky-dink library. A sign in the window reads, "FREE INTERNET."
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'll just be a minute. He climbs out and heads inside. Jane looks down the street and sees something that intrigues her. 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 62A.

direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I need a horse.

direction.raw_text: Then give me one of those, large enough to ride. The Pet Store Clerk looks confused. Just then, Thor hears a CAR HORN. He turns to the open door. Across the street, Jane calls to him from the Pinzgauer. 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 63.

direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: "And though they're large, giants can be quiet. You have to listen carefully for the sound of their footsteps -- because they may be closer than you think." Nearby, Selvig sits at a computer terminal, finishing up his e-mail. Beside him, a KID flips through a book with interest. The Librarian stops mid-story and calls to the Kid pleasantly.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Joshua, come sit down. It's story time. The Kid closes his book and joins the others. Selvig looks over, notices the title of the book the Kid was reading -- "MYTHS AND LEGENDS FROM AROUND THE WORLD." He picks it up, flips through it, stops at the section on Scandinavian Mythology. It's a picture of a RAINBOW BRIDGE coming down from Asgard to earth. ASGARDIANS walk upon it, among them ODIN, LOKI, and
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: who wields Mjolnir. On the ground below them, a group of VIKINGS kneel reverently. He eyes the illustration, pondering.

direction.raw_text: . DESERT - DUSK 70 Jane's Pinzgauer cuts off the road, heads over the rugged terrain. Storm clouds roll in over the desert sky.

direction.raw_text: . PINZGAUER - DUSK 71 Jane drives, pumped with adrenaline, nervous and excited, as Thor sits beside her, upbeat and eager for battle. 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 63A.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Who are you? Really?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You'll see soon enough.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You promised me answers. 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 63B. Thor looks at her, charmed by her persistence.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What you seek -- it's a bridge.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: A bridge? Like an Einstein-Rosen Bridge?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: More like a rainbow bridge. 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 64. A beat.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: God, I hope you're not crazy.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . DESERT - NIGHT 71A As the Pinzgauer heads away, we continue up a hillside, revealing a light illuminating the valley beyond. As we move closer, we see the glow comes from -- A MASSIVE SHIELD BASE Now set up around the crater -- vehicles, trailers, barricades. Armed GUARDS man a gate in the razor wire fence that runs fifty yards from the crater's edge, enclosing the complex. Clear, plastic access tubes with junction boxes lead to a translucent cube structure erected in the middle of the crater. Through the glass walls of the base's command trailer, we see Coulson directing TECHNICIANS, busy at work. Within the cube structure itself, a team of SHIELD SCIENTISTS work with high-tech machinery, analyzing the object at the center of it all -- Mjolnir.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . RIDGE ABOVE CRATER - NIGHT 72 Jane and Thor crawl to the edge of the ridge, look through binoculars, see the impressive SHIELD base.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That isn't a satellite crash. They would have hauled the wreckage away, not built a city around it. Thor shrugs out of his jacket and hands it to her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You're going to need this.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Why?-- Thunder RUMBLES overhead. She stares at him intently and takes his jacket.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Stay here. Once I have Mjolnir, I will return what they stole from you. 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 64A. He looks to her, already knowing that Jane may disobey his request.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Deal?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No! Look what's down there! You can't just walk in, grab our stuff, and walk out!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No. Jane looks relieved.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm going to fly out. Before she can react, he starts heading towards the crater. The first drops of rain begin to patter into the dust. 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 65.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Wait... But Thor is already headed towards the crater.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . SHIELD BASE / INT. HAMMER CONTAINMENT CUBE STRUCTURE 72A A NEEDLE spikes on a handheld SENSOR DEVICE. The TECHNICIAN holding it looks over at the hammer. Mjolnir begins to give off a subtle glow. A bolt of lightning CRACKS across the sky above.

direction.raw_text: Feed from the keyhole. Can barely penetrate the cloud cover. The Techie hikes a thumb at another monitor, SQUELCHING with static. It shows an SAR shot of the area, laid over a terrain map.

Just then, the Agents notice a section of the fence has been bent up from the ground, leaving a gap. 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 66. Before they can call it in, a massive CRACK OF LIGHTNING illuminates the night sky -- revealing the silhouette of a large man standing outside the driver's (Jackson's) side of the jeep. DeLancey looks over, notices.

Jackson slumps over the steering wheel, as DeLancey starts to raise a shotgun at Thor. Thor grabs the barrel, yanks it out of DeLancey's hands and thrusts the hilt back, smashing the Agent's jaw. Thor reaches into the jeep to grab a rain slicker.

Sitwell and the Techie watch the monitors warily. On the monitor showing the hammer containment area, Mjolnir starts to crackle with energy.

direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (V.O., ON PHONE) You've reached Dr. Erik Selvig. Please leave me a message. His voicemail BEEPS. She talks quietly, urgently.

direction.raw_text: But if you don't hear from me again, you might want to come out to the crater site and look for me. I kind of did what you said I shouldn't do. Thanks. Bye. She hangs up.

direction.raw_text: . SHIELD DESERT BASE - COMMAND TRAILER 79 Coulson emerges from the SHIELD command trailer and marches across the mud, radio to his ear. He looks out across the lit up site uneasily. 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 67.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . SHIELD DESERT BASE - NIGHT 80 A SHIELD GUARD moves through the base, rifle in hand. From the shadows behind a trailer, a FIGURE looks out at him. As the Guard raises his radio to check in, Thor quickly rushes towards him and chokes him out. He falls to the ground. Thor notices the AR-15 rifle lying on the ground beside the fallen Guard. He stares down at the weapon quizzically. As more GUARDS approach, Thor snatches up the weapon and takes cover in the shadows of the trailer. The Guards pass by. Thor peers around the corner, sees the well-guarded main entrance tube to the center of the site. A bright light suddenly illuminates his face. He looks to see an ATV moving across the site, shining its spotlight right on him. Thor sees that the ATV DRIVER has spotted him. The Driver raises his radio to report. Thor knows he has to act fact. He raises the rifle -- then flips it over in the air and catches it by the barrel. He rears the weapon back, then hurls it like a hammer. It flies through the air, smashing the ATV's spotlight. Glass and debris shower the driver, who takes his hands off the wheel to protect himself. The ATV roars out of control past the Guards near the tube entrance. The Guards notice and chase after it. Thor emerges from the shadows, watches the Guards abandoning the site entrance.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . EDGE OF CRATER 80A The ATV Driver looks forward in panic as the ATV approaches the crater lip. The vehicle careens over the edge of the crater and heads straight for one of the plastic tunnels. The Technicians inside scatter as the ATV CRASHES into it, tearing into the tunnel, sending sparks everywhere. The ATV finally comes to a stop, the tunnel collapsing around it and the Driver. SHIELD AGENTS rush in behind to help. 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 67A.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . RIDGE ABOVE CRATER 81 Jane peers over the ridge, stares down at the frenzied aftermath of the ATV crash, at the base on high alert. Lightning CRACKS in the sky behind her.

direction.raw_text: . MAIN ENTRANCE TUBE 82C As SHIELD Agents pull the ATV driver from the wreckage, Thor races towards the unguarded entrance to the tunnels and heads inside.

direction.raw_text: . ENTRANCE TUBE 82D Thor races up the entrance ramp. Before him, two GUARDS round the corner. Thor knocks out the first Guard, then tackles the second. He hurries around the corner, when more GUARDS come up a ladder ahead. Thor punches the closest Guard, sending him tumbling backwards, toppling the others on the ladder behind him. Thor takes off running, as the Guards regroup and give chase. Thor spots the glow of Mjolnir in the central cube, through the translucent walls of the tunnels. He hurries through to tunnels to find a way towards it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I want eyes up high. With a gun. Now! 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 67B.

Thor turns around, runs back the way he came. The Agents give chase.

direction.raw_text: Overlooking the complex. It's a clear field of vision, nowhere to hide. A digital read-out gives information on the distance to the target. He locks in on Thor, who's inside the plastic tubing, emerging from the junction box and heading towards the cube structure.

direction.raw_text: . TUNNEL 83A Thor races through the tunnel, comes across a wall of AGENTS. Thor ROARS and barrels through them -- elbowing, punching -- whatever it takes to keep moving. As he takes down the last Agent, Thor sees the last junction box and the entrance to the cube structure up ahead. He races towards it. He can actually see Mjolnir within the middle of the structure, when -- BAM! From out of nowhere, a fist lands a powerful blow across his jaw, sending him reeling. Dazed, Thor looks up to see -- A HUGE SHIELD AGENT The biggest of them all, standing between him and his hammer in the cube structure beyond. Thor sizes him up.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You're big. Thor grins.

direction.raw_text: Fought bigger.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . JUNCTION BOX 83B Thor and the Huge Agent explode through the wall of the junction box, then crash into the mud, sending them sliding. 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 68A.

direction.raw_text: . CRANE BUCKET 83C Barton has Thor in his sites. The sniper stands still as a statue.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . TUNNEL 83D Coulson hurries through the tunnel, ready to give the word to Barton, when he stops short. He sees what looks like an electrical storm erupting inside the structure ahead, directly above the crater... and the hammer.

direction.raw_text: . RIDGE ABOVE CRATER 83E Jane sees SHIELD Agents and Guards swarming into the cube containment structure.

direction.raw_text: No...

direction.raw_text: . CRATER 84 Thor and the Huge Agent struggle to stand in the mud. Through the translucent walls of the cube structure, Thor sees Mjolnir. The Huge Agent rises up before him, blocking his view. Rain and blood run down Thor's face. He lunges forward, whipping his feet in front of him, then kicks out, nailing the Huge Agent in the chest. The Agent goes down hard as Thor's momentum carries him past. Thor stands, heads for the cube structure, when the Huge Guard grabs his ankle in a last effort. Thor looks back down at his foe, then drops backwards, pile driving his elbow into the fallen Agent's chest. The Huge Agent grimaces in pain, defeated. Thor races back towards the structure.

His hammer rests just a few yards before him, energy surging around it. Coulson steps into the structure through an access tunnel, one story up. 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 68B. As Thor approaches his hammer, Mjolnir starts to glow brighter, blue electricity sparking off its surface. The crackling energy seems to reach out to him. Coulson notices, his interest piqued. Above the open ceiling of the structure, Barton's crane bucket comes into view.

direction.raw_text: . CRANE BUCKET 84I Wind and rain whip around Barton as he stares into his rifle site, locked on the back of Thor's head -- his finger on the trigger.

direction.raw_text: Barton...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . CRANE BUCKET 84K Barton stands ready to take Thor down. His finger starts to squeeze the trigger.

direction.raw_text: (V.O., ON RADIO) ...hold your fire. Barton releases the trigger, pulls up. 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 69.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . HAMMER CONTAINMENT CUBE 84L Coulson watches Thor with anticipation as Thor wraps his hand around the hammer. He smiles, triumphant, lifts... but the hammer doesn't move. Thor looks confused, tries again with two hands, to no avail
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: anger and frustration overtaking him. He strains with all his might, SCREAMS from the effort, bellowing up at the storm and lightning above him. Something begins to appear on the side of Mjolnir -- glowing
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . Thor looks down, sees them. But, still, the hammer doesn't budge. Thor falls to his knees before it, rain pouring down around him, as the glowing runes fade away. He's failed. Unworthy. Coulson looks on, disappointed.

direction.raw_text: move in, guns trained on Thor, surrounding him. Coulson activates his radio.

direction.raw_text: Ground units, move in. Show's over. As the Agents surround him, Thor doesn't seem to notice or care. He just sits there on his knees, head bowed in the rain -- a man broken, lost. From overhead, we see the hammer in the cube containment room. We pull up as the Guards approach Thor, then continue to climb, until we see the whole camp -- and the extensive damage Thor's done to it during the melee.

direction.raw_text: . RIDGE ABOVE CRATER - NIGHT 86 Jane lowers her binoculars, sensing things have gone from bad to worse. She steels herself, then starts over the ridge to help him. Almost immediately, a SPOTLIGHT sweeps past her. She hears the sound of DOGS and SHIELD AGENTS approaching, sees the glow of flashlights moving from the base towards her. With no other choice, she makes a quick retreat. 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 69A.

direction.raw_text: . HEIMDALL'S OBSERVATORY - NIGHT 87 Heimdall stands at his post, watching the scene. He lowers his head.

direction.raw_text: . SMITH MOTORS - LAB - NIGHT 88 Jane stands with Selvig and Darcy in the empty lab. Darcy picks up the book Selvig checked out of the library, looks through it.
