direction.raw_text: I can't just leave him there. 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 70.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Why not?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You didn't see what happened. Darcy points at an illustration of Thor's hammer in the book.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hey! Myeu-muh! Jane looks at the illustration in the book, turns to Selvig knowingly.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Where did you find this? Selvig grabs the book from them, quickly closes it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: In the children's section. I wanted to show you how ridiculous his story was. Jane is unconvinced by this. She knows he wants to believe.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Aren't you the one who's always told me to chase down all leads, all possibilities?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I was talking about science, not magic!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Magic's just science we don't understand yet. Arthur C. Clarke.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Who wrote science fiction.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The precursor of science fact.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: In some cases.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: If that's really an Einstein-Rosen Bridge out there, then there's something on the other side. (MORE) 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 70A.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Advanced beings could have come through it before.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Jane...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: A primitive culture like the Vikings might have worshipped them as deities. They give her a look, surprised by her unexpectedly insightful input. Darcy shrugs. Jane points at her, grateful for the support.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes! Exactly! Thank you! Darcy beams. 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 71.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Jane, if you do this, you'll find yourself in a situation that I won't be able to get you out of this time.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'll help you. Jane looks grateful. Selvig looks at her, sees there's no stopping her. He sighs.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . SHIELD HOLDING CELL - NIGHT 89 Thor sits in a chair, staring forward blankly, hands cuffed behind him. Coulson stands across from him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's not easy to do what you did. You made us all look like a bunch of mall cops. That's hurtful. (THEN) The men you so easily subdued are highly-trained professionals, and in my experience, it takes someone who's received similar training to do what you did to them. Would you like to tell me where you received your training? Thor sits silently.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Pakistan? Chechnya? Afghanistan? Then again, you strike me more as the soldier of fortune type. What was it, South Africa? Still no answer. Coulson leans in close to him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Certain groups pay well for a good mercenary. Especially HYDRA. Coulson waits for a response, but gets none.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Who are you? 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 72.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Just a man.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: One way or another, we find out what we want to know. We're good at that. Coulson leaves the room. Thor lowers his head.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (O.S.) I thought he'd never leave. Thor looks up, shocked to find Loki standing there, dressed in 21st century attire.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Loki? What are you doing here?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I had to see you.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What's happened? Tell me! Is it Jotunheim? Let me explain to
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Father is dead. Thor stares at him, stunned.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Your banishment, the threat of a new war, it was too much for him to bear. The implications of Loki's words dawn on Thor -- he's responsible for his father's fate. Loki draws close to him, looks in his eyes, consolingly.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You mustn't blame yourself. I know that you loved him. I tried to tell him so, but he wouldn't listen. (MORE) 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 73.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (THEN) It was cruel to put the hammer within your reach, knowing you could never lift it. Thor stares ahead, falling deeper into the abyss.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The burden of the throne has fallen to me now.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Can I come home?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The truce with Jotunheim is conditional upon your exile.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: But couldn't we find a way to--
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Mother has forbidden your return. Thor nods, lowers his head, beaten.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This is goodbye, brother. I'm so sorry.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No, I'm sorry. Loki... thank you for coming here.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Nothing could have stopped me. Coulson enters the room, but seems to take no notice of Loki.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Fare well, brother.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Good-bye.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Good-bye? I just got back. Thor looks up to see that Loki is gone.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Now. Where did we leave off? 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 73A.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . CRATER - NIGHT 90 Agents and Scientists work to repair the damaged area around Mjolnir. They take no notice of Loki as he steps up beside the hammer. He stares at it -- intrigued, wondering. Can he do it? He reaches down, tries to lift it -- but can't. He lets it go, eyes it with contempt, then steps away. He gestures with his arms. An odd GREEN AND GOLD LIGHT rises from the ground, enveloping him, then he disappears.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . HOLDING CELL - NIGHT 91 Sitwell enters and speaks sotto to Coulson.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sir... he's got a visitor. 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 74.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . SECURITY ROOM - MOMENTS LATER 92 Coulson and several other SHIELD AGENTS stand across from Erik Selvig.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: "Donald Blake?"
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Doctor Donald Blake. He's part of our team.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You have dangerous coworkers, Dr. Selvig.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Troubled, not dangerous. He was distraught when he found out that you'd taken all of our research. It was years of his life, gone! He got depressed, started drinking, and... well, you know the rest.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Uh-huh. You mind if we take a moment to verify his identity?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Certainly. The Techie at a computer nearby runs the name.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You can understand how a man could go off like that. I mean, a big, faceless organization like yours, coming in with their jack-booted thugs and stealing private property... (THEN) ...is how he described it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That doesn't explain how he managed to tear through our security. Selvig shrugs.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Steroids. He's a bit of a fitness nut. 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 74A. On the Techie's monitor, a DMV record from the State of New York pops up reading "DR. DONALD BLAKE". The license photo is indeed a picture of Thor -- the one Darcy took with her cellphone. 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 75. The Techie hits a button, and a graphic reads, "SHIELD SECURITY ANALYSIS IN PROGRESS." Coulson eyes the screen. After a beat, he turns back to Selvig.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It says here he's an M.D.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He is. That is, he was. He switched careers and became a physicist. He's quite brilliant, really. (THEN) If you would just release him to me, I promise to keep an eye on him. Coulson thinks, sizing Selvig up -- then smiles. He turns to an AGENT nearby.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Release Dr. Blake to Dr. Selvig here. The Techie looks to him, surprised.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (TO SELVIG) Make sure he stays in town for the next few days in case we need to talk to him again. Selvig shakes his hand.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Thank you.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . SHIELD HOLDING CELL - NIGHT 92A Selvig bursts into the room with a SHIELD Agent to find a seated Thor.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Donny, Donny, Donny! There you are! Thor looks up, unsure what the hell is going on. Selvig pulls Thor to his feet, gives him a warm hug.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's going to be all right, my friend. Come on, I'm taking you home. 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 75A. He leads the bewildered Thor out the door.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . COULSON'S TRAILER - NIGHT 92B As Thor and Selvig make their way past the SHIELD Security Room, Thor notices Jane's possessions and equipment from the Smith Motors lab stacked under a tarp. He spots Jane's hand- written journal among them. As he passes, he quickly takes it from the pile and pockets it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . SECURITY ROOM - NIGHT 92C Coulson looks at the computer bearing Donald Blake's DMV record. A security warning over the image clearly reads
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : FALSIFIED DATA." He knows it's been a ruse all along. He looks to Selvig and Thor heading away from the Security Room, then follows them outside.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . SHIELD DESERT BASE - NIGHT 93 Coulson and two SHIELD Agents watch as Selvig walks with Thor away from the base to the SUV. Coulson calls to Selvig.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Just keep him away from the bars.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I will!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Where are we going? Selvig drops his cool demeanor.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: To get a drink. Selvig and Thor climb into the SUV. As they drive off, Coulson turns to the other two agents -- GARRETT and CALE.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Follow them. 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 76.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . JOTUNHEIM - DAY 94 Loki, looking apprehensive, walks alone across the icy surface of the planet.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . LAUFEY'S TEMPLE - DAY 95 Darkness shrouds the ruined temple, save for the shafts of light which knife their way in through the damaged ceiling. Loki enters. Frost Giant guards surround him on all sides. Laufey approaches, towers over him menacingly.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Tell me why I shouldn't kill you.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I've come alone and unarmed.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: To what end?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: To make you another proposition.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: So you're the one who let us into Asgard.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You're welcome.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: My men are dead, and I have no Casket. You are a deceiver. Laufey lashes out, grabs Loki around the throat, but Loki calmly stands his ground.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You have no idea what I am. The blueness spreads across his face, as Laufey and the guards stare in shock. Loki grins.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hello, Father. Laufey releases him. Loki's body turns back to normal. Intrigued, Laufey sizes up his son. 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 76A.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ah, the bastard son. I thought Odin had killed you. That's what I would have done. He's as weak as you are.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No longer weak. I now rule Asgard, until Odin awakens. Perhaps you should not have so carelessly abandoned me. This gives Laufey pause.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Or perhaps it was the wisest choice I've ever made. I will hear you. 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 77.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I will conceal you and a handful of your soldiers, lead you into his chambers, and let you slay him where he lies. I'll keep the throne, and you will have the Casket. Laufey studies Loki's face.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Why would you do this?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: When all is done, we will have a permanent peace between our two worlds. Then I, the bastard son, will have accomplished what Odin and Thor never could.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This is a great day for Jotunheim. Asgard is finally ours.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No. Asgard is mine. The rest of the Nine Realms will be yours, if you do as you're told. Laufey considers the proposition.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I accept. Loki turns to leave. As he goes, the slightest trace of a smile crosses his face.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . HEIMDALL'S OBSERVATORY - DAY 96 Loki emerges out of the Bifrost, as Heimdall steps away from his controls. Heimdall glares at Loki. Loki notices.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What troubles you, Gatekeeper? 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 78.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I turned my gaze upon you in Jotunheim, but could neither see nor hear you. You were shrouded from me, like the Frost Giants who entered this Realm.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Perhaps your senses have weakened after your many years of service.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Or perhaps someone has found a way to hide that which he does not wish me to see. Loki sizes him up, smiles.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You have great power, Heimdall. Tell me, did Odin ever fear you?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And why is that?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Because he is my King, and I am sworn to obey him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Exactly. Just as you're sworn to obey me now. Yes? A beat.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Good. Then you will open the Bifrost to no one until I have undone what my brother has started. Loki heads out of the Observatory. Heimdall stares after him. 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 78A.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . BAR - NIGHT 97 Thor and Selvig sit at a booth at the back of the local dive. The bartender sets down a couple mugs of beer and two shots of whiskey. Selvig pours the shot into his mug and downs it. Thor follows his example. 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 79.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Seems Darcy's a terrible intern, but a talented hacker.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Thank you for what you've done.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Don't thank me. I only did it for Jane.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Are you in love with her?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Of course not! Jane's like a daughter to me. Her father and I taught at University together. A good man, but he never listened. This registers with Thor.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Neither did I. Selvig eyes him with interest.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I don't know if you're really delusional, and I really don't care at this point. I just care about her. I've seen the way she looks at you.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I swear to you, I mean her no harm.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Good. If that's the case, then I'll buy you one more drink, and you'll leave town tonight. A long pause, then Thor nods. He takes a drink. 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 80.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I had it all backwards. I had it all wrong. Selvig watches him keenly. This is a different Thor than he's seen before.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's not a bad thing, finding out that you don't have all the answers. That's when you start asking the right questions. Thor takes this in.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: For the first time in my life, I have no idea what I'm supposed to do. SELVIG Anyone who's ever going to find their way in this world has to start by admitting they don't know where the hell they are. Thor nods.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (O.S.) Hey, I know you, man... An intimidating DRUNK TOWNIE nearby sizes up Thor. He is one of the Townies from Isabela's Diner who saw Thor earlier. He approaches, belligerent and looking for a fight. DRUNK TOWNIE (CONT'D) You were in the diner with that hot girl. Thor doesn't like where this is going. DRUNK TOWNIE (CONT'D) I wouldn't mind her doing a little research on me. He laughs. Thor is annoyed. THOR I have no quarrel with you. But she's a lady. You should be more respectful. 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 80A.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And you should shut the hell up, princess. Selvig looks to Thor, concerned that he's going to lose it. But, to his surprise, Thor remains unaffected by the Townie's baiting. THOR I will not fight him. DRUNK TOWNIE Then it'll be easy to kick your ass. Selvig stands, steps between the two men.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Gentlemen, please. Let's keep our heads. Just then, Selvig HEAD-BUTTS the Townie, knocking him out. Thor's impressed. Selvig downs his drink, then hurls his glass aside, SHATTERING it on the ground. 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 81.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (TO THOR) Another drink?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . MAIN STREET - NIGHT 98 Thor and Selvig stumble down the street, singing a NORWEGIAN FOLK SONG. They improvise an impromptu drinking song dance routine involving side steps and happy slaps, optimistically in time with the song.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: "The mood is good, our hearts are full, there's magic in the air. / It's all because we're here tonight, and haven't got a care. / So raise a glass, and toast to life, wherever it may lead / Tra-la- la, tra-la-la, a friend is fine indeed. / Tra-la-la, tra-la-la, a friend is fine indeed!" Thor holds up a hand for Selvig's last finishing slap. Selvig misses it completely and falls out of frame like a straight dead weight with a CLUNK.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . Emerging from behind the car where Selvig fell, Thor stands up, Selvig slung over his shoulder, and starts to walk up the street towards Jane's trailer.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . JANE'S TRAILER - NIGHT 99 The small trailer is in a state of perpetual disarray, strewn with various books, old pizza boxes, etc. A worried Jane lies on her bed, trying to read. She's startled by the loud RAPPING on the door. She bolts to the door and opens it to find -- THOR Standing there with the unconscious Selvig slung over his shoulder.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Erik! (TO THOR) Is he all right?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He's fine. Not injured at all. 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 81A. As Thor enters, he BANGS Selvig's head on the doorway. Selvig GROANS.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sorry, my friend.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What happened?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We drank. We fought. He made his ancestors proud. 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 82.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Put him on the bed. Thor moves through the small trailer carrying Selvig, like a bear lugging another bear, smashing into things along the way, until he finally sets Selvig down on Jane's bed. Selvig awakens groggily and looks up at him through bleary eyes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I still don't believe you're the God of Thunder. (THEN) But you ought to be. Thor grins, pats him on the cheek. As Selvig drifts off to sleep, Thor pulls a blanket over him. Jane watches, stunned by their friendship, impressed by Thor's tenderness. Thor turns back to her, looks around.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: These are your chambers? Jane suddenly becomes self-conscious. She starts cleaning up the mess around her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well, it's more of a temporary living space, really. I don't usually have visitors in here. Actually, never... Thor picks up a sock off the floor. She snatches it from him, puts it away.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Can we go outside?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . SMITH MOTORS - ROOF - NIGHT 100 Thor steps off a ladder onto the roof of Smith Motors. He offers Jane his hand, helps her up. There's a telescope set up, a couple chairs, some blankets.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I come up here sometimes when I can't sleep. Or when I'm trying to reconcile particle data. Or when Darcy's driving me crazy. (THEN) I come up here a lot, now that I think about it. Thor looks at the night sky, filled with stars. 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 82A.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm glad you're safe.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You've been very kind. I've been far less grateful than you deserve.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I also hit you with my car a couple times, so it kind of evens out. He grins, then reaches into his pocket and pulls out her
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I don't believe it... She takes it from him, surprised and grateful.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It was all I could get back. Not as much as I promised. I'm sorry.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No, this is good. Thank you. This means I don't have to start from scratch... She sits down and opens the notebook eagerly, then stops, a harsh realization clouding her face. Thor notices.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What's wrong?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: whatever they are. They're never going to let this research see the light of day.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You must do this. You must finish what you've started.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Why?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Because you're right. It's taken so many generations for your people to get to this point. You're nearly there. You just need someone to show you how close you really are. 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 83. Thor moves beside her, opens her notebook, turns to the page which bears a sketch of the Bifrost. He takes the pen from the notebook, begins to add to the sketch, leading from one point to another in space.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Look -- your ancestors called it magic. You call it science. I come from a place where they're one and the same thing. We recognize that Thor is drawing the branches of Yggdrasil as she looks on, amazed and intrigued.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What is it?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This is how my father explained it to me... (THEN) Your world is one of the Nine Realms of the Cosmos, linked to each other by the branches of Yggdrasil, the Worlds Tree. Now, you see it every day, without realizing. Images glimpsed through
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: what did you call it?... (checks her notebook) ...this Hubble Telescope. So, Nine Realms... They look at each other. She nods. They smile. This is going to be a long night.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . SMITH MOTORS - ROOF - LATER 101 Jane sleeps beside Thor on the blankets on the rooftop. He stares up at the night sky. She rolls close to him, nuzzles against him in her sleep. He looks down at her, beautiful in the moonlight, looks out at the town beyond her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . HEALING ROOM - DAY 102 Volstagg eats ravenously from a PLATTER OF FOOD. Sif stands nearby, ill at ease. Fandral watches Volstagg incredulously as the large warrior stuffs himself. Finally Fandral can stand it no more. 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 84.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Our dearest friend banished, Loki on the throne, Asgard on the brink of war, yet you manage to consume four wild boar, six pheasant, a side of beef, and two casks of ale. Shame on you! Don't you care?! Fandral moves to throw the platter in the fire, but Volstagg pulls his weapon, stopping him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Do not mistake my appetite for apathy.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Stop it, both of you! We all know what we have to do, we're just too damned afraid to do it!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We must go. We must find Thor. Hogun starts to pull the delicate HEALING STONES from the fire, carefully putting them into a POUCH at his side.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's treason, Hogun.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: To hell with treason, it's suicide. (SUDDENLY NERVOUS) Now, shh! Heimdall may be watching! It's said he can hear--
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes, yes, we know!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Thor would do the same for us. An EINHERJAR GUARD enters. They tense.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Heimdall demands your presence. Volstagg quickly drains his flagon of ale.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We're doomed. 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 84A.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . MAIN STREET - MORNING 103 Dawn breaks over the quiet town of Puente Antiguo.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . SMITH MOTORS - ROOF - DAY 104 Thor awakens, looks down to see Jane still sleeping, nuzzled against him. She opens her eyes, looks up at him and smiles. 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 85. He stands, offers his hand, helps her to her feet.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . SMITH MOTORS - LAB 105 Thor helps Jane down off a ladder. A groggy, hungover Selvig emerges from Jane's trailer. He sees Thor with Jane. Selvig eyes the two of them together, then:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I need some coffee. The three head inside Smith Motors.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Agents Garrett and Cale watch the scene, pointing a small audio surveillance device towards the lab.
direction.name: direction

result.heading: FROM THE LIBRARY ROOFTOP ACROSS THE STREET SHIELD

direction.raw_text: . SMITH MOTORS - LAB - DAY 105A Darcy and Selvig sit at a card table, drinking coffee. Thor holds a couple plates as Jane makes eggs on a hotplate. She scoops them out onto the plates. Thor takes them over to the table, sets them down before Selvig and Darcy.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Thanks.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You're very welcome. Jane joins them at the card table with a couple more plates. She and Thor sit with the others and start to eat their breakfast, looking like a little family.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 86.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . MAIN STREET 108 On a roof across the street from Smith Motors, Agents Garrett and Cale continue their surveillance, bored out of their wits. Agent Cale watches the group through the lab window with binoculars. Agent Garrett listens to his comm-link, turns to Cale.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They want an update.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Tell them he's eating eggs.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Scrambled or fried? Cale glares at him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Target is eating eggs, sir. We'll keep you posted.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . SMITH MOTORS - LAB 108AA As the group finishes breakfast, Thor looks at the mug in his hand, gets an idea.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: May I have this?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sure.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Thank you. Excuse me a moment. Thor leaves.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . MAIN STREET - MOMENTS LATER 108A In front of her diner, Isabela prepares to open for the day. (Through the window of Isabela's, we see chairs still atop tables.) Isabela sweeps the front porch. She looks up to see Thor approaching. She eyes him suspiciously. He offers her a MUG.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: To replace the one I broke. Please forgive my behavior. 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 86A. She takes it, looks at it curiously, then smiles at him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Okay. Thank you.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: If I may, I'd like to come back for more of your "coffee."
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Any time. He nods and walks away. She stares after him, smiling, and shrugs.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: She could do worse.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . HEIMDALL'S OBSERVATORY - DAY 109 Sif and the Warriors Three enter warily to find the intimidating Heimdall standing before the Observatory's controls. He glares at them accusingly.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Good Heimdall, less us explain--
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You would defy the commands of Loki our King, break every oath you have taken as warriors, and commit treason to bring Thor back? The four exchange nervous glances.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes, but--
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Good. The group looks puzzled. What did he just say?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: So you'll help us?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I am bound by honor to our King. I cannot open the Bifrost to you. With that, Heimdall leaves them alone in the Observatory. The others exchange puzzled looks. 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 86B.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Complicated fellow, isn't he?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Now what do we do? Sif glances at the control panel, notices something.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Look! The others turn to see HEIMDALL'S SWORD stuck into the control panel. They exchange a grin. They have an ally. Sif hits the controls, and the Bifrost apparatus fires up.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . SHIELD DESERT BASE - SECURITY ROOM - DAY 110 Coulson races in as a SHIELD TECHIE calls up satellite footage of the Bifrost storm on a monitor.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What the hell was that? 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 87.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I don't know, sir. We got massive energy readings out of nowhere, then they just disappeared. Fifteen miles due northwest.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Let's go take a look.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . BIFROST LANDING SITE (EARTH) - DAY 111 Amidst the fury of the Bifrost storm, the Warriors Three and Sif drop to the ground in the New Mexico desert. They clamber to their feet as the Bifrost quickly recedes, the hole in the sky closing up behind it. The Bifrost runes cover the desert sand around them.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He must have landed nearby. It's time to put our tracking skills to work. Spread out. Check the sand for indentations of his boot prints.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The winds would have blown them away by now. We should look for signs of a campfire.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Or we could just start there. She points behind them to the town of Puente Antiguo in the distance -- the only visible sign of civilization -- and to Hogun, who has already started walking towards it. Volstagg and Fandral trade looks, their egos bruised.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's worth a look, I suppose. The party tromps towards the town.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . MAIN STREET - DAY 112 Townsfolk stare in wonder at the Warriors Three and Sif, as they stroll down the street in all their Asgardian splendor.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . DOWN THE STREET - DAY 113 A BOY Hits a baseball, which rolls under a parked car. He runs to retrieve it, but can't reach it. Suddenly, the side of the CAR rises into the air. The boy looks over, his mouth dropping open at what he sees. Volstagg easily holds the car up with one hand. 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 88. Volstagg picks up the boy's ball, then drops the car. He hands the ball back to the boy, tousling his hair. VOLSTAGG There you go, lad! The boy just stares, standing frozen. The Asgardians head off.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Is it just me, or does Earth look a little different to you?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It has been a thousand years...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Things change so fast here. You leave for a millennium, and it's like the whole neighborhood's gone. Volstagg sniffs, smells something.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Perhaps we should split up.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . PUENTE ANTIGUO - ROOFTOP - DAY 114 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 89. Agents Cale and Garrett spot Sif, Fandral, and Hogun walking down the street.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Is there a Renaissance Faire in town?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Call it in. But before they can, Volstagg rises up behind them, smashes their heads together. They're out.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Never cared for spies. He starts to go, then sees their bag of fast food on the ground. Intrigued, he pulls out a cheeseburger and takes a bite. He likes what he tastes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Exquisite.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . PALACE GROUNDS - DAY 115 Loki stands with Gungnir, surveying his kingdom, when an Einherjar Guard quickly approaches him, out of breath.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: My liege, the Warriors Three and the Lady Sif have gone missing. Loki reacts. He knows who's responsible.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . RAINBOW BRIDGE - DAY 116 Loki approaches Heimdall on the Rainbow Bridge.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Tell me, Loki, how did you get the Jotuns into Asgard?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You think the Bifrost is the only way in and out of the Realm? There are secret paths between worlds to which even you with all your gifts are blind. But I have need of them no longer, now that I am King. (THEN) And I say, for your act of treason, you are relieved of your duties as Gatekeeper. And you are no longer a citizen of Asgard. 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 90.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Then I need no longer obey you. Heimdall raises his massive sword, strides towards Loki. Loki reaches out and, with both hands, takes hold of something invisible, hovering in mid-air before him. As it quickly fades into view, we realize what it is -- THE CASKET OF ANCIENT WINTERS. The blueness creeps from his hands and up his arms, as Loki opens the Casket towards Heimdall, who is fast approaching. From inside the Casket, all hell breaks loose. The fury of the Casket is unleashed, its winds not just howling, but
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: as ice and snow and darkness come flying straight towards Heimdall. Ice clings to his body, freezing him, but still he moves forward. Loki starts to get worried. Heimdall is nearly upon him. The Gatekeeper swings his massive sword at the prince. But the blade STOPS, frozen, just inches from Loki's throat. Loki breathes a sigh of relief and steps past him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . HEIMDALL'S OBSERVATORY - DAY 117 Loki inserts Gungnir into the Observatory's control panel and opens the Bifrost. He gestures, and the veiled DESTROYER appears before him, a fiery glow rising within it. It turns its head toward its King.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ensure my brother does not return.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . SMITH MOTORS - LAB - DAY 118 Jane, Thor, Darcy, and Selvig make a charming team, tidying up after breakfast -- washing, drying, and putting plates and utensils away. The door opens.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (O.S.) Found you! Thor, Jane, Selvig, and Darcy turn to see -- SIF AND THE WARRIORS THREE Staring baffled at the sight of the domestic Thor drying dishes in mortal clothing. Jane drops a plate. It goes SHATTERING on the floor. 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 90A.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: My friends! Thor happily races over and greets his comrades. Jane, Selvig, and Darcy watch the Asgardians from across the room. Jane looks concerned. Selvig and Darcy eye them with wonder.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I don't believe it...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Who are they? 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 91.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Lady Sif and the Warriors Three. Surely you've heard tales of Hogun the Grim, Fandral the Dashing, and
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Volstagg the Svelte? Selvig looks pointedly at Volstagg's massive gut.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well, perhaps I've put on a little more muscle since I was here last.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That would have been a thousand years ago? Northern Europe? VOLSTAGG Exactly! Those lovely herring people. They worshipped us! Thor grins, lays a hand on Volstagg's shoulder.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: My friends, I've never been happier to see anyone. But you should not have come.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We're here to take you home. Jane reacts to the news of Thor leaving.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You know I can't. My father is dead because of me. I must remain in exile. The other Asgardians exchange puzzled looks.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Thor... your father still lives. Thor reacts to the revelation.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . BIFROST LANDING SITE (EARTH) - DAY 119 A few SHIELD vehicles are parked by the Bifrost site. A few
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: agents stand nearby as SCIENTISTS take readings. Coulson kneels, examines the Bifrost Runes. He turns to an Agent. 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 92.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Get somebody from Linguistics out here. Just then, they hear a RUMBLING overhead, as the Bifrost storm ROARS in the sky above. Coulson and the SHIELD Agents scramble for cover, their vehicle windshields SHATTERING, as the Bifrost storm grows in strength. Finally, the hole in the sky overhead opens, and the funnel cloud EXPLODES out of it, touching down onto the desert floor. Coulson and the Agents shelter their eyes from the maelstrom.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . SMITH MOTORS - DAY 121 Thor and the others see the Bifrost storm forming in the distance.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Was somebody else coming? Just then, the Bifrost funnel EXPLODES down to the ground.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . BIFROST LANDING SITE (EARTH) - DAY 122 From behind a jeep, Coulson and the SHIELD AGENTS stare at the Destroyer in awe. We don't see it, just its shadow as it moves towards them.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Is that one of Stark's?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I don't think so. But the guy doesn't tell me anything. 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 93. Coulson grabs a megaphone, steps forward, calls out to the Destroyer.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hello! You're using unregistered weapons technology. Please identify yourself. We hear the HUM of the Destroyer's fiery energy power up inside.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Incoming! As the SHIELD Agents scramble for cover, a blast of energy from the Destroyer EXPLODES a vehicle. SHIELD agents return fire.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . SMITH MOTORS - DAY 123 Townspeople fill the streets, staring at the fire fight in the distance. Thor and the Asgardians prepare for battle, as Thor turns to Jane.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Leave this town now. Get yourself and your friends to safety.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What about you?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I must stay and fight. The Asgardians look to Thor.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm still a warrior, and I will fight by your side.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You're but a mortal now. You'll get yourself killed!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Or one of us, trying to protect you. 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 94.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The best thing you can do is get the mortals to safety and leave the battle to us. Thor looks at the townsfolk around them, all oblivious to the oncoming threat.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You're right. Sif looks surprised. Thor turns to Jane, Selvig, and Darcy.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Help me clear the streets. I'll let none of these people die this day. Thor, Jane, Selvig, and Darcy start to herd the crowd of Townsfolk off the streets, as the Warriors Three and Sif head across town, towards the Destroyer.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 95.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . HEIMDALL'S OBSERVATORY - DAY 125 Laufey and two Frost Giants appear out of the Bifrost and step onto the platform. Loki is waiting for them. He pulls Gungnir from the Observatory's control panel. The giant apparatus slows to a stop.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Father. Welcome to Asgard.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . BIFROST LANDING SITE (EARTH) - DAY 125A The site looks like the aftermath of a war zone. The smoldering wreckage of SHIELD vehicles lies strewn about.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . MAIN STREET - DAY 126 Thor, Jane, and Selvig clear the streets, loading confused
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: into cars, moving others indoors.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . MAIN STREET - EDGE OF TOWN - DAY 127 A dog makes it way down the street, barking at something in front of it. Then we see it -- THE DESTROYER Strides down the street, a red, fiery energy glowing from within it. It unleashes BLASTS as it goes, blowing up cars, setting storefronts aflame.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 96.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . STREET 129 Sif and the Warriors Three head down the street towards the Destroyer.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Keep him distracted. She hurries off. The Warriors Three continue towards the behemoth.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What do you think? "The Svartalfheim Twist?" "Kiss of the Hag?" "Face Full of Boot?" Volstagg grins eagerly.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: "The Flying Mountain." Hogun and Fandral groan.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Not "The Flying Mountain!" It threw out my back for a year last time!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Trust me, it'll work.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . SMITH MOTORS - DAY 130 Thor looks anxiously back down the street, where the Warriors Three get into position before the Destroyer.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: My friends fight bravely, but they won't be able to hold it back much longer. Darcy hurries out of the burning pet store carrying as many animals in cages as she can, then loads them into a truck.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hogun and Fandral take off running towards the Destroyer, as Volstagg stands limbering up.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Come on! 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 96A. Volstagg takes off running at full speed. As he catches up to his comrades, Hogun and Fandral grab him on either side, and with all their Asgardian might, hurl the voluminous warrior into the air at the black metal behemoth.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: For Asgaaaaard!!! 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 97. The Destroyer is unable to react quickly enough, as Volstagg
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: into the creature. It looks like it might actually work for a moment, but the Destroyer stays on its feet. It lifts Volstagg into the by the scruff of his neck. He shrugs apologetically. The Destroyer savagely HURLS him at Hogun and Fandral, smashing into them, when -- SIF Leaps off a nearby rooftop with her two-headed spear and plunges it deep into the back of the creature. The creature stands there motionless, the fire dimming in its faceplate, Sif standing atop its back. The Asgardians have a brief moment of hope. But the creature stirs with life, its fire igniting once again. Sif looks on with growing trepidation. Slowly, unnaturally, the Destroyer spins its torso around 180 degrees to face its attackers. The Destroyer unleashes a blast at Sif. She barely dives off of the behemoth in time, dodging the blast. The Destroyer rises again to its full height, pulling free from Sif's staff, the weapon slipping through the slats of its armor. Sif and the Warriors Three try to regroup, when the Destroyer unleashes another blast, sending Sif and her comrades flying in all directions. Hogun's POUCH OF HEALING STONES breaks free, landing in the middle of the street.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . SMITH MOTORS - DAY 131 Thor sees his friends lying injured on the ground, but has no time to act, as the Destroyer fires in his direction. A storefront near Smith Motor EXPLODES, knocking Thor, Jane, and Selvig off their feet. Thor helps Jane to her feet, when they notice Selvig lying on his back amidst the debris, impaled by a twisted piece of iron.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Erik! She and Thor hurry to his side. He's losing blood, going into shock.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Go! Leave me! 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 98. Jane takes his hand as Thor spots Hogun's pouch of healing stones lying in the middle of the street. He makes a break for it, dodging through the flaming wreckage, then grabs the pouch and races back. He opens the pouch to find the fragile stones crushed and useless. He pours the contents out in his hand.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Come on... give me one! Amidst the useless powder, he finally finds one stone still intact. Thor tosses the pouch aside, holds the stone over the end of the iron rod.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What are you doing? What is that? As the stone begins to glow, Thor crushes it. Jane looks on, amazed, as the glowing powder falls upon the piece of iron, dissolving it, heading downwards, until it reaches Selvig's wound. The powder heals his wound completely. Thor looks down the street, sees his wounded friends still lying there, as Selvig sits up in utter astonishment. He reaches through the hole in his shirt to touch his healed flesh.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (to Jane, re: Thor) I'm really starting to like him. Jane turns to Thor to find he's gone.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . DOWN THE STREET 132 Thor reaches Sif, who lies dazed, battered, and bloodied on the ground. He pulls her behind a burning vehicle.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Go, while you can!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: But the others...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You can't help them now. Your job is to survive. She struggles to sit up. 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 98A.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No! I will die a warrior's death. Stories will be told of this day-- He gently takes her shield from her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Live and tell those stories yourself. At last, she nods. Thor spots Volstagg lying unconscious, with Hogun and Fandral lying nearby. Thor makes his way towards them. Volstagg is barely breathing. Thor tries to pull him to safety, but it's no use. He won't budge. He rouses Hogun and Fandral.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (RE: VOLSTAGG) Get him out of here!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No. We can still fight!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: But not win. Move Volstagg, or he'll die! Thor looks at them, grins.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Don't worry, my friends. I have a plan. The two Warriors reluctantly grab their fallen friend and drag him away from the battlefield. After they go, Thor turns to back to the Destroyer, then tosses Sif's shield aside. He strides down the street towards the behemoth, completely defenseless.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Brother... for whatever I have done to wrong you, whatever I have done to lead you to do this, I am sorry. But these people have done nothing to you. They are innocents. He continues towards the Destroyer. 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 98B.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Take my life, and know I will never return to Asgard. 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 99. Thor reaches the Destroyer, extends his arms. The Destroyer hesitates, sizing up the defenseless Thor, then swats him with its enormous arm. We hear the sickening CRACK of breaking bones as Thor goes flying. Thor lands in a crumpled, broken heap in front of Smith Motors, before Jane, Selvig, and Darcy. The wounded Asgardians watch helplessly from down the street, a look of horror on their faces. Jane tries to rush out to Thor's aid, but Selvig holds her back.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Jane, no! He pulls her into Smith Motors. A RAVEN flies overhead, watching the scene -- 133 INT. ODIN'S CHAMBERS - SAME TIME 133 Odin lies in the Odinsleep. A single tear rolls down the Allfather's cheek. 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 100.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . SMITH MOTORS - DAY 134 Thor's eyes close, his last breath leaving his lips. The Destroyer stands over Thor's body, lowers its head towards him. It opens its faceplate, locks it in place, readying to unleash its fiery blast.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . SHIELD DESERT BASE 135 Inside the crater, the RUNES of the side of Mjolnir reappear, burning bright. Electricity starts to CRACKLE on the hammer's surface. SCIENTISTS beside it take notice as it vibrates, and a RUMBLE comes from overhead. They look up. Clouds form in the sky above. Just then, with a CRACK and flash of lightning, Mjolnir flies straight up into the air like a rocket.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . MAIN STREET 136 The Destroyer unleashes its blast at Thor's body, when -- KRAKAKABOOM! A blinding BOLT OF LIGHTNING strikes down from above, colliding with the Destroyer's blast. The explosion is massive. The Destroyer is hurled backwards, a cloud of dust enveloping the street. As the smoke clears we see -- JANE Oh. My. God.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Clad in his full battle armor, holding Mjolnir in his hand -- the God of Thunder once more. Thor kneels, brings Mjolnir down onto the ground.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ! Lightning strikes the Destroyer. It convulses. Thor swings Mjolnir around, takes off straight up into the air, as the Destroyer gets back on its feet and looks up at the Thunder God. Storm clouds gather around Thor as he summons gale force winds. Debris from the battle begins to rise up into the sky. The Destroyer stays there, kept grounded by its massive weight. 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 101. It lifts its head up at the Thunder God, opens its faceplate, locks it in place, unleashes its blast. Thor dives downwards straight at it, with Mjolnir before him. Mjolnir collides with the Destroyer's fiery energy blast, overpowering it, pushing it back, forcing it downwards at the Destroyer. Thor jams his hammer deep into the Destroyer's faceplate. The fiery energy within the creature builds up and EXPLODES within him, firing out of all his openings. Thor smashes the Destroyer to the ground in a tremendous heap, the fiery energy within it extinguished forever. Thor pulls Mjolnir from its faceplate, walks away from its lifeless carcass. As he does, the other objects and debris pulled into the air by the gale winds drop down from the skies, around the Destroyer, burying it. Jane and Thor's comrades, now roused, stand to join him. A battered Coulson approaches with several SHIELD AGENTS.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Donald... I don't think you've been completely honest with me.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . BIFROST LANDING SITE (EARTH) - DAY 137 Thor, Jane, Darcy, Selvig and the other Asgardians stand in the desert with Thor, Coulson, and several SHIELD AGENTS. Darcy turns to Volstagg.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: So, how can you speak our language?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Your language? Ha! Silly girl, you're speaking ours. Thor calls up to the sky.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Heimdall! Open the Bifrost!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . RAINBOW BRIDGE - DAY 138 Heimdall stands frozen. 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 102.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . BIFROST LANDING SITE (EARTH) - DAY 139 Thor looks to the others with concern.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He would open it if he could. I fear the worst.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Then we're trapped here forever.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Then I suppose we'd best start settling into our new lives. He looks to Darcy, turns on the charm.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Are all earth maidens as fair as you? Darcy enjoys the attention.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No. Thor shouts back up to the sky.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Heimdall!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . RAINBOW BRIDGE - DAY 140 From inside the ice, Heimdall hears Thor calling to him. Knowing that the fate of Asgard depends on him, he musters all his strength. The ice around him begins to CRACK. With a tremendous effort, Heimdall SHATTERS free from the ice. Weakened, near death, he drags himself inside the Observatory.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . BIFROST LANDING SITE (EARTH) - DAY 141 The Asgardians begin to lose hope. Volstagg eyes a SHIELD Agent's machine gun.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Primitive. Good enough for hunting small game, I suppose. Suddenly, the Bifrost EXPLODES down from the sky. Thor grins. The mortals look on, amazed. Fandral turns to Darcy. 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 102A.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sorry, my love. These things happen. 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 103. He joins the other Asgardians at their side. Thor turns to Coulson.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Know this, son of Coul. You and I, we fight for the same cause -- the protection of this world. From this day forward, count me as your ally. (THEN) If you return the items you have stolen from Jane Foster.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Not stolen. Borrowed. Jane shoots him a look. Coulson quickly continues.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You'll get your equipment back. You're going to need it to continue your research... which, after today's events, SHIELD would like to fully sponsor. If that's all right with you. Thor takes Jane's hand, kisses it tenderly. She looks at him, her eyes filled with the fear that she may never see him again.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Whatever fate lies before me, you are part of it. He takes her in his arms, kisses her passionately. Thor and the Asgardians leap into the Bifrost.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . HEIMDALL'S OBSERVATORY - DAY 142 The Asgardians emerge from the Bifrost to find Heimdall slumped over his controls.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (to the others) Get him to the healing room! Leave my brother to me. 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 104. Thor bolts out the door.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . ODIN'S CHAMBERS - DAY 143 Odin lies in the Odinsleep, Frigga at his bedside. She hears the SHOUTS of Guards outside, the sound of a battle. Frigga grabs a sword. A Frost Giant bursts in. She swings the sword around hard, cleaving into his shoulder. He swats her aside angrily. Laufey and the Brute Frost Giant enter. Laufey looks at Odin lying helpless on the bed.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . RAINBOW BRIDGE - DAY 144 Thor rides the winds over the Bridge, speeding towards the palace.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . ODIN'S CHAMBERS - DAY 145 The Jotun king stands over the unconscious Odin, relishing the moment. He forms an ICE BLADE.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . ODIN'S PALACE - DAY 146 Thor races through the entrance to the palace.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . ODIN'S CHAMBERS - DAY 147 Laufey stands before the sleeping Odin.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's said you can still see and hear what transpires around you, even in this state. I hope it's true, so that you may know your death came by the hand of Laufey. He raises his blade above Odin's body, when -- A BLAST OF ENERGY Hits him from behind. As the Jotun king falls to the ground, we see it is not Thor standing behind him, but Loki, holding Gungnir.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And your death came by the son of Odin. 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 104A. Laufey dies as the other two shocked Frost Giants move for Loki. He fires Gungnir at one, blasting him against a wall, taking him out. 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 105. The Brute is nearly upon him, when the Jotun stops suddenly, his eyes going wide. The Brute falls to the ground,
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Standing behind him -- the sword stuck in his back. She looks to Loki, takes him in her arms.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I swear to you, mother, they will pay for what they've done today. I will end the Jotun threat, now and forever! He looks to Odin.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And I will make you proud. Loki savors the moment, but it's short-lived, as Thor bursts in. He's thrown by the scene before him -- Odin safe, Laufey and two Jotuns dead, Frigga regarding Loki with pride and respect. Stunned and delighted to see Thor, Frigga beams.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Thor! She moves to Thor and hugs him, but Thor's eyes remain fixed on his brother. Loki looks at Mjolnir in his brother's hand.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Found its way back to you, did it?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No thanks to you. Frigga picks up on the tension building between her sons.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Why don't you tell her? How you sent the Destroyer to kill our friends? To kill me? Frigga looks to Loki, alarmed and confused.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It must have been enforcing Father's last command. 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 106.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You're a talented liar, brother. Always have been.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's good to have you back. (DEAD SERIOUS) Now, if you'll excuse me, I need to destroy Jotunheim. Loki suddenly raises Gungnir, FIRES it point-blank at Thor. Thor goes flying backwards, SMASHING through the chamber walls, into...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . ODIN'S PALACE - CORRIDOR 148 Thor flies from the blast through ANOTHER wall on the opposite side of the corridor, to...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . PALACE GROUNDS - DAY 149 Thor plummets from the palace and CRASHES into the reflecting pools below.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . HEIMDALL'S OBSERVATORY - DAY 150 Loki speeds on horseback down the Rainbow Bridge, then quickly dismounts and enters the Observatory.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . HEIMDALL'S OBSERVATORY - DAY 151 Loki operates the Observatory's controls. The massive turret spins, points.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . PALACE GROUNDS - DAY 152 Thor awakens to the sound of the Bifrost. He stands, sees the Observatory firing the Bifrost energy into space. He looks to where the Bifrost is aimed.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Jotunheim...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . RAINBOW BRIDGE - DAY 153 Thor soars on the winds above the Rainbow Bridge, the Bifrost energy roaring through Bridge, feeding into the Observatory. He lands before the Observatory's huge doorway.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . HEIMDALL'S OBSERVATORY 154 Thor enters, shields his eyes from the brilliant light of the Bifrost energy blasting towards Jotunheim. 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 106A. He looks over to the controls, sees that they're frozen in an enormous block of ice. Loki stands atop it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: All these years, and no one's ever dared to use it as a weapon. Thor hurries to the ice, raises his hammer to SMASH through it to get to the controls frozen within. Before he can, Loki fires Gungnir. The blast hits the ice in front of Thor, blasting him back across the floor. Loki steps down from the ice as Thor staggers to his feet. 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 107.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You can't stop it. The Bifrost will build until it rips Jotunheim apart.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Why have you done this?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: To do what Father never could. To destroy their kind forever. When he awakens, he'll see the wisdom of what I've done.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He won't! You can't kill an entire race!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What is this newfound love for the Frost Giants? You, who would have killed them all with your bare hands.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I've changed.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: So have I. Loki hits Thor across the face with Gungnir.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Fight me. He swings Gungnir at Thor again. Thor catches it in his hand, rears back his hammer as if ready to return the blow, but instead takes to the air and flies past Loki, back towards the frozen controls. Loki spins around, aims Gungnir, and fires a blast which immobilizes Thor in the air. He hangs there, suspended.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Is the throne really worth what you've done? What you would become?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I never wanted the throne. I only wanted to be your equal. Now fight me! 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 108. With a gesture of Gungnir, he flings Thor to the ground. Thor rises to his feet, turns to Loki.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I will not fight you, brother.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I am not your brother. I never was.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Loki, this is madness... Loki grins.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Is it? He FIRES Gungnir at Thor. Thor dodges the blast, rolls to his feet.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What happened to you on earth that turned you so soft? Don't tell me it was a woman. Thor doesn't answer. Loki laughs, realizing he's right.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It was. Perhaps when we're finished here I'll pay her a little visit myself. That did it. Loki and Thor rush at each other. They and their weapons collide. The two battle -- Loki unleashing years of pent-up rage and jealousy, Thor having no choice but to defend himself.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . JOTUNHEIM - DAY 155 It's mayhem. The growing Bifrost TEARS through the ice of the planet like a destructive wave, breaking it apart.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: go running in terror, others fall through the breaking ice.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . BIFROST LANDING SITE (EARTH) 156 Jane, Selvig, Darcy, and Coulson look up with concern at the hole in the sky, where excess Bifrost energy builds up around it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Jane? 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 108A.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Something's wrong. 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 109.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . HEIMDALL'S OBSERVATORY 157 Thor and Loki battle savagely. Loki fires Gungnir, sending Thor sliding across the floor and knocking Mjolnir from his hand. The hammer flies into the Bifrost towards Jotunheim. Thor raises his hand towards his hammer, tries to summon it back to him, to keep it in this Realm, but the Bifrost is too powerful. Mjolnir disappears into the maelstrom as Thor himself slides towards the Bifrost.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: If you care so much for the Jotuns, then die with them. The Bifrost stretches every cell of Thor's body, trying to drag him away. He's nearly swallowed by the vortex, when he concentrates, mustering his will. He reaches out his hand towards the Bifrost.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: flies back through the maelstrom, into Thor's hand. The hammer pulls him free. Loki tries to fire off another blast at him, but Thor takes to the air, speeds towards his brother.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . HEIMDALL'S OBSERVATORY 158 Thor and Loki come CRASHING through the Observatory dome and land hard, rolling across the Rainbow Bridge. As Thor gets to his feet, he sees Loki dangling off the Bridge's edge.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Thor! Help me! Thor steps over to the side of the Bridge, sees Loki looking up at him desperately.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Please... Loki's fingers start to slip. Thor reaches down to grab his brother's wrist, but his hand passes through Loki's. Just then, the REAL LOKI materializes behind him. Thor whirls around as Loki STABS him in the chest with Gungnir. Loki lifts Thor into the air, impaled on the spear, and hurls him across the bridge. 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 110. Thor, bleeding, rises to his knees. Loki strides up behind him to finish him off, when Thor swing his hammer around. It passes through him. Instantly, another Loki appears next to him, Thor swings his hammer, but that too is an illusion. Loki after Loki appears, Thor futilely swinging at each one, never making contact. Thor falls back to his knees. The Lokis grin as their raises their spears, encircling him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I was always more clever than you.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yet still not clever enough. With that, Thor raises his hammer, rising into the air, summoning lightning. A massive bolt strikes Mjolnir, then channels outwards, splitting up, striking each one of the Lokis. All of them dissipate into nothingness, save one -- the real Loki -- who's sent flying back across the Bridge, Gungnir knocked from his grasp. Thor steps over to his fallen brother, lying dazed on his back. Loki winces, prepares for the worst, when Thor steps away. Loki opens his eyes, tries to stand, but can't. He looks confused, then sees what the problem is -- Mjolnir rests atop his chest. Struggle as he may, Loki can't lift it off. He's pinned to the ground. Thor looks about him desperately -- at the Bifrost firing towards Jotunheim, gaining in strength, at the surge of energy moving through the Bridge. He's at a loss of what to do. Loki watches him smugly.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Look at you, the Mighty Thor. With all your strength, what good does it do you now? Thor knows Loki's right. He's powerless to stop what's happening. He looks down at the Bridge beneath his feet,
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: from the force and speed of the Bifrost energy feeding into the Observatory. Then he gets an idea. He realizes what he must do -- and what he must sacrifice. Thor extends his hand towards Loki, summoning Mjolnir. The hammer goes flying to his grasp. Loki looks confused. 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 111. Thor raises Mjolnir in the air. Clouds form above him, thunder RUMBLING. Lightning arcs off of his hammer, as he channels the power of the storm into it, then -- He strikes Mjolnir down upon the Rainbow Bridge. The blow is massive, causing a rumbling along the whole bridge, shaking the Observatory itself like an earthquake. A crack appears where the blow struck. Loki rises to his feet.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Stop! What are you doing?! Thor lifts the hammer again, brings it down harder. BOOM! The crack grows bigger. The Bifrost energy starts to stream out from it. Loki thinks fast.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: If you destroy the Bridge, you'll never see her again! Loki grabs Gungnir, runs towards him, ready to pierce Thor through the back.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Forgive me. Summoning every bit of strength he has left, Thor raises Mjolnir one last time, drawing lightning to it from all sides, and brings it down with a final, terrible blow -- KRAKABOOM! The Bifrost SHATTERS, rainbow energy EXPLODING out of it. Both Loki and Thor are hurled into the air by the force of the blast. A wave of destruction moves forward along the Bridge towards the Observatory, breaking it apart as it goes. The Observatory RIPS ITSELF APART. As Loki and Thor fall together, Thor grabs hold of one end of Gungnir, while Loki still clutches the other. They both fall towards the MASSIVE WAVE of Bifrost energy which spews out from the broken Bridge. They're an instant from being blasted by the destructive force of the energy, carried away by the current, pulverized by the debris, when -- A POWERFUL HAND Catches Thor's leg. Thor dangles there, holding onto Gungnir as Loki hangs onto the other end. Loki looks up, shocked to
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 112.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Standing on the edge of the broken Bridge, awakened from the Odinsleep, restored to his full strength. Loki searches his father's face, looking for some kind of approval, some kind of redemption, but all he sees is disappointment and regret. Loki lets go.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No! But it's too late. Odin and Thor can only watch as Loki falls into the rushing torrent of Bifrost energy. It carries him away, along with the debris of the Bridge and the Observatory, disappearing out of sight. Odin pulls Thor up onto the Bridge. Drained, Thor falls back into his father's arms.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It is over.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - DAY 159 The Bifrost energy explodes in the sky like fireworks firing in all directions. Jane, Selvig, Darcy, and Coulson stand watching in amazement. Jane looks back up at the sky, distraught. She knows the significance of what's just happened.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's gone.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . ODIN'S PALACE - BANQUET HALL - NIGHT 160 A FEAST is in progress as Thor, Sif, and the Warriors Three sit amongst the gathered Asgardians. Hogun sits between Fandral and Volstagg, who is in the middle of recounting their battle with the Destroyer.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...and then, with a mighty bellow, I flew at the great metal beast and laid it low... 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 113.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Is that another way of saying you fell on your huge a--
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: As a matter of fact, falling down was a tactic. Lulling the Destroyer into a false sense of security!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well, I was the one who had to drag your enormous carcass off the battlefield. That makes me the real hero. Doesn't it, Hogun? Hogun points to Volstagg.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Big stomach. (points to Fandral) Big mouth. The other gathered Asgardians laugh. Volstagg and Fandral look to Hogun. The grim warrior gives just a trace of a smile.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well, how about that? A smile! I'd say that calls for another drink! They laugh and raise another round. Frigga sits nearby, lost in thought, her face betraying the sadness she struggles to conceal. Sif notices, approaches Frigga, bows her head.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: My Queen. I am so sorry for your loss. Frigga takes Sif's hand appreciatively.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Thank you, Sif. She looks to Thor, who's unable to enjoy the merriment around him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: How is he? 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 113A.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He mourns for his brother. And he misses her. The mortal. Frigga sees the trace of regret in Sif's face as she looks at Thor with new feelings. He rises and leaves the hall.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He will need his friends now more than ever.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I will always be at his side. Frigga understands, puts her arm around Sif gratefully.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . PALACE BALCONY - NIGHT 161 Thor stands alone on the balcony, lost in thought. Odin walks up behind him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You'll be a wise King.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: There will never be a wiser king than you. Or a better father. (THEN) I have much to learn. I know that now. But some day, perhaps, I will make you proud.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You've already made me proud. Odin leaves, Thor consoled by his words.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . RAINBOW BRIDGE - NIGHT 162 Out of the broken, jagged Rainbow Bridge flows the Bifrost energy, drifting off into space. Thor walks out to its edge, where Heimdall stands watch. Thor stares out at the stellar void. 4th BLUE REVISIONS 03-26-10 114.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Can you see her? Heimdall turns, gazes out towards Earth.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: How is she?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . SMITH MOTORS - LAB - NIGHT 163 Through the window into Jane's lab, we see an enlarged
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: from her notebook pinned to a board. As we pull away, we see a computer terminal displaying a program clearly inspired by the illustration. We pull further back to see that the lab has been transformed into a well-funded research facility, abuzz with activity.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: and AGENTS work with impressive, state-of- the-art equipment. Selvig orchestrates the process, giving instructions to the
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . We continue to track right outside the glass windows and rise up to find Jane sitting at the front of the roof, working at a small, improvised workstation, notebook at hand, as always. She sets up an impressive, HIGH-TECH DEVICE before her, which bears the "STARK INDUSTRIES" logo. From behind, Darcy approaches, hands her a flash drive.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Here you go.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Thanks. Jane inserts the flash drive into the device.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He would have come back if he could.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I know. But if he can't get here on his own... Jane hits a switch on the device. Suddenly, a 3-D HOLOGRAPHIC PROJECTION bursts to life over the device, bathing the two women in its glow. We recognize what it is -- YGGDRASIL, in all its beauty. "
direction.name: direction
